tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: IN THE NORTHERN DARKNESS there is a fish

sense.def: the (northern) dark

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: and his name is K'un.

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: The K'un is so huge

sense.def: being big; big size (of a state etc.); large range

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: I don't know how many thousand li he measures.

sense.def: (one) does not know the answer to S; it is unknown whether S

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: He changes and becomes a bird

sense.def: be transformed, be completely changed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: He changes and becomes a bird

sense.def: become (ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: whose name is P'eng.

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: The back of the P'eng

sense.def: back

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: measures I don't know how many thousand li across

sense.def: (one) does not know the answer to S; it is unknown whether S

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: and, when he rises up and flies off,

sense.def: puff oneself up by breathing heavily

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: When the sea begins to move,2

sense.def: postnominal particle, topic marker

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: this bird sets off for the southern darkness,

sense.def: sea

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: this bird sets off for the southern darkness,

sense.def: course along on a revolving circular course (typically said of stars in the Heavens)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: this bird sets off for the southern darkness,

sense.def: move to, migrate to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.1; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: which is the Lake of Heaven.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: The Universal Harmonǚ

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: and it says:

sense.def: text

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: and it says:

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: "When the P'eng journeys to the southern darkness,

sense.def: move to, migrate to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: the waters are roiled for three thousand li.

sense.def: be whipped up

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: He beats the whirlwind and rises ninety thousand li,

sense.def: circulate; move in circles

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: He beats the whirlwind and rises ninety thousand li,

sense.def: go up; move upwards

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: setting off on the sixth month gale."

sense.def: gale, storm

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.2; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 4; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: bits of dust,

sense.def: dust and dirt (of all kinds)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: the sky looks very blue.

sense.def: blue hue, blue colour

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: Is that its real color,

sense.def: true, real

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: Is that its real color,

sense.def: colour

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: or is it because it is so far away and has no end?

sense.def: reach, get to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: or is it because it is so far away and has no end?

sense.def: extreme limit; ultimate point

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: When the bird looks down,

sense.def: what is low in the terrain; what is below one

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: all he sees is blue too.

sense.def: be like, resemble

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.3; Guo Qingfan 4; Wang Shumin 6; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying:3

tls:text.tls:line: all he sees is blue too.

sense.def: desist, give it a break; stop at a certain point, leave it at that, leave things as they are and do nothing about them

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: If water is not piled up deep enough,

sense.def: moreover (with non-narrative S)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: If water is not piled up deep enough,

sense.def: get accumulated

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: If water is not piled up deep enough,

sense.def: abundantly, in large quantity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: it won't have the strength to bear up a big boat.

sense.def: support the weight of; have on one's back; carry along (not necessarily on one's own back) 驢負 "carry on donkey-back"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: it won't have the strength to bear up a big boat.

sense.def: ship; ferry

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: Pour a cup of water into a hollow in the floor

sense.def: (one) cup of N (Note incidentally that the number one is lexically predictable, and not contextually determinate.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: Pour a cup of water into a hollow in the floor

sense.def: hollow; cavity; hole in the ground; depression in the surface

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: and bits of trash will sail on it like boats.

sense.def: mustard plant; mustard seeds

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: and bits of trash will sail on it like boats.

sense.def: serve as a boat (?)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: But set the cup there and it will stick fast,

sense.def: put (something) in (a place)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: But set the cup there and it will stick fast,

sense.def: beaker on a high foot; mostly: flat plain bowl with ears used for broth or for wine etc

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: But set the cup there and it will stick fast,

sense.def: after vi-comp: than this =於之

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: But set the cup there and it will stick fast,

sense.def: Lu Deming p. 360 古孝反 ore 如字 get stuck

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: for the water is too shallow and the boat too large.

sense.def: shallow (of water)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: for the water is too shallow and the boat too large.

sense.def: "boat"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: If wind is not piled up deep enough,

sense.def: the air carried by the wind: air 四大(NB: PERHAPS THE ANCIENT CHINESE ONLY RECOGNISED THE NOTION OF FENG AS MOVED AIR AND DID NOT RECOGNISE FENG AS AN UNMOVED SUBSTANCE. 待考)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: If wind is not piled up deep enough,

sense.def: abundantly, in large quantity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: it won't have the strength to bear up great wings.

sense.def: support the weight of; have on one's back; carry along (not necessarily on one's own back) 驢負 "carry on donkey-back"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: it won't have the strength to bear up great wings.

sense.def: wings; also transferred military sense: the wings

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: he must have the wind under him like that.

sense.def: the air carried by the wind: air 四大(NB: PERHAPS THE ANCIENT CHINESE ONLY RECOGNISED THE NOTION OF FENG AS MOVED AIR AND DID NOT RECOGNISE FENG AS AN UNMOVED SUBSTANCE. 待考)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: Only then can he mount on the back of the wind,

sense.def: ride on the back of, support oneself on

tls:text.tls:srcline: 背負青天，而莫之夭閼者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: shoulder the blue sky, and nothing can hinder or block him.

sense.def: back

tls:text.tls:srcline: 背負青天，而莫之夭閼者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: shoulder the blue sky, and nothing can hinder or block him.

sense.def: support the weight of; have on one's back; carry along (not necessarily on one's own back) 驢負 "carry on donkey-back"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 背負青天，而莫之夭閼者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: shoulder the blue sky, and nothing can hinder or block him.

sense.def: stand in the way of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: Only then can he set his eyes to the south.

sense.def: head for, head in the direction of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.4; Guo Qingfan 5; Wang Shumin 8; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 5

tls:text.tls:line: Only then can he set his eyes to the south.

sense.def: south

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: The cicada and the little dove laugh at this, saying,

sense.def: cicada

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: The cicada and the little dove laugh at this, saying,

sense.def: pidgeon

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: The cicada and the little dove laugh at this, saying,

sense.def: normally: find ridiculous and laugh at, sneer at

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: "When we make an effort and fly up,

sense.def: we, our party; we for our part

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: "When we make an effort and fly up,

sense.def: fly up

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: we can get as far as the elm or the sapanwood tree,

sense.def: elm tree ?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: we can get as far as the elm or the sapanwood tree,

sense.def: kind of tree, "sweet oak"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 時則不至，而控於地而已矣，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: but sometimes we don't make it and just fall down on the ground.

sense.def: from time to time> sometimes; often; periodically; several times; at regular intervals; all the time

tls:text.tls:srcline: 時則不至，而控於地而已矣，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: but sometimes we don't make it and just fall down on the ground.

sense.def: fall onto N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 時則不至，而控於地而已矣，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: but sometimes we don't make it and just fall down on the ground.

sense.def: the earth, the ground

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: Now how is anyone going to go ninety thousand li to the south!"

sense.def: go to (so as to stay there for a considerable time, or for some business); move towards; of things: be moved to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: Now how is anyone going to go ninety thousand li to the south!"

sense.def: move southwards

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: Now how is anyone going to go ninety thousand li to the south!"

sense.def: how? (i.e. in no way); for what? to what purpose? (with or without additional 何)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: If you go off to the green woods nearby,

sense.def: go to and get to a certain place; be on one's way to a certain place, head for

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: you can take along food for three meals

sense.def: thrice; three ways; in three ways; under three aspects

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: you can take along food for three meals

sense.def: SHI: have a meal

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: you can take along food for three meals

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: and come back with your stomach as full as ever.

sense.def: belly, stomach

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

sense.def: without change from the past: still

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: If you are going a hundred li,

sense.def: go to and get to a certain place; be on one's way to a certain place, head for

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: you must start getting the provisions together three months in advance.

sense.def: assemble persons or things; amass; gather around oneself

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

sense.def: grain, provisions; food rations for travel; provisions, rations

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: What do these two creatures understand?

sense.def: this, these 之二虫 "these two (kinds of) creatures" (ZHUANG)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.5; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 10; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 7

tls:text.tls:line: What do these two creatures understand?

sense.def: animals (general); the animal (of the season etc)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.6; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 10

tls:text.tls:line: the shortlived cannot come up to the long-lived.

sense.def: short-lived creatures

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.6; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 10

tls:text.tls:line: the shortlived cannot come up to the long-lived.

sense.def: long-lived

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.6; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 10

tls:text.tls:line: How do I know this is so?

sense.def: how?

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.6; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 10

tls:text.tls:line: the summer cicada knows nothing of spring and autumn.

sense.def: winter cicada (?)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.6; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 10

tls:text.tls:line: They are the short-lived.

sense.def: short-lived creatures

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.7; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying10

tls:text.tls:line: South of Ch'u there is a caterpillar

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.7; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying10

sense.def: year; year(s of age); age sān shí suì 三十歲 "thirty years of age", NOT normally in post-archaic Warring States texts: "for thirty years" (Cf. ZHUANG 以五百歲為春)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.7; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying10

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.7; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying10

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.7; Guo Qingfan 9; Wang Shumin 12; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying10

tls:text.tls:line: They are the long-lived. Yet P'eng-tsù alone is famous today for having lived a long time,

sense.def: the Chinese Methusaleh who lived to the age of 800. His life is described in 列仙傳.

sense.def: longevity

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.8; Guo Qingfan 14; Wang Shumin 15; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 11

sense.def: length

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.8; Guo Qingfan 14; Wang Shumin 15; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 11

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.10; Guo Qingfan 14; Wang Shumin 15; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying11

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.10; Guo Qingfan 14; Wang Shumin 15; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying11

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.11; Guo Qingfan 16; Wang Shumin 17; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 14

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore a man who has wisdom enough to fill one office effectively,

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.11; Guo Qingfan 16; Wang Shumin 17; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 14

sense.def: official duties; bureau; 五官 "five bureaus"; office, official position NB: the distinction between the offices as such and their holders is blurred for very good reasons, since officials acted as representatives of their bureau.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.11; Guo Qingfan 16; Wang Shumin 17; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 14

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.11; Guo Qingfan 16; Wang Shumin 17; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 14

tls:text.tls:line: virtue enough to please one ruler,

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.11; Guo Qingfan 16; Wang Shumin 17; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 14

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 1.1.11; Guo Qingfan 16; Wang Shumin 17; Fang Yong 5; Chen Guying 14

sense.def: come into being for the first time, make one's appearance, appear on the scene

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.4; Guo Qingfan 45; Wang Shumin 42; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; Graham 1981: 48

tls:text.tls:line: But when it does, then ten thousand hollows begin crying wildly.

sense.def: opening to the outside world, aperture; hollow; hole

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.4; Guo Qingfan 45; Wang Shumin 42; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; Graham 1981: 48

tls:text.tls:line: Can't you hear them, long drawn out?

sense.def: marker of rhetorical questions inviting or suggesting/presupposing a negative answer, derived from the meaning "as the only person"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.5; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 42; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; Graham 1981: 48f

tls:text.tls:line: like noses,

sense.def: nose

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: "By the piping of earth, then, you mean simply [the sound of] these hollows,

sense.def: pipe

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: "By the piping of earth, then, you mean simply [the sound of] these hollows,

sense.def: opening to the outside world, aperture; hollow; hole

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: "By the piping of earth, then, you mean simply [the sound of] these hollows,

sense.def: definitely, "!"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: and by the piping of man [the sound of] flutes and whistles.

sense.def: pipe

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: and by the piping of man [the sound of] flutes and whistles.

sense.def: aligned

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: and by the piping of man [the sound of] flutes and whistles.

sense.def: bamboo flutes

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: and by the piping of man [the sound of] flutes and whistles.

sense.def: definitely, "!"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: But may I ask about the piping of Heaven?"

sense.def: may I ask about N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.7; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 33; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: But may I ask about the piping of Heaven?"

sense.def: pipe

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: "Blowing on the ten thousand things in a different way,

sense.def: blowing (of wind)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: "Blowing on the ten thousand things in a different way,

sense.def: in infinite ways

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: so that each can be itself -

sense.def: desist, give it a break; stop at a certain point, leave it at that, leave things as they are and do nothing about them

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: all take what they want for themselves,

sense.def: all, each of the subjects

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: all take what they want for themselves,

sense.def: presumably, - I suppose -, perhaps; apparently???

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: all take what they want for themselves,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: all take what they want for themselves,

sense.def: make choices; show preferences

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.1.8; Guo Qingfan 46; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 34; Chen Guying 34; A.C. Graham 1981: 49

tls:text.tls:line: but who does the sounding?" 2

sense.def: cause the contextually determinate object to breathe

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Great understanding is broad and unhurried;

sense.def: read zhì: consciousness, awareness, understanding; level of understanding

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: little understanding is cramped and busy.

sense.def: read zhì: consciousness, awareness, understanding; level of understanding

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Great words are clear and limpid;3

sense.def: statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Great words are clear and limpid;3

sense.def: be figuratively blazing and full of energy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: little words are shrill and quarrelsome.

sense.def: statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: In sleep, men's spirits go visiting;

sense.def: be deep asleep

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: In sleep, men's spirits go visiting;

sense.def: male soul which returns to heaven;

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: With everything they meet they become entangled.

sense.def: strike up relations with, make contact with (a person); communicate with; handle

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Day after day they use their minds in strife,

sense.def: daily, every day; day in and day out; progressively generally: all the time

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.1; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Day after day they use their minds in strife,

sense.def: wrestle, engage in fighting

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Their little fears are mean and trembly;

sense.def: fear, fright; an atmosphere of fear

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: their great fears are stunned and overwhelming.

sense.def: fear, fright; an atmosphere of fear

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: They bound off like an arrow or a crossbow pellet,

sense.def: trigger mechanism (especially in crossbow)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: certain that they are the arbiters of right and wrong.

sense.def: truth; right and wrong; notions of right and wrong

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: They cling to their position as though they had sworn before the gods,

sense.def: behave in a stubborn way

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: They cling to their position as though they had sworn before the gods,

sense.def: sworn contracts

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: They cling to their position as though they had sworn before the gods,

sense.def: enter a sworn contract

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: sure that they are holding on to victory.

sense.def: victory

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: They fade like fall and winter -

sense.def: decline and annihilation

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: such is the way they dwindle day by day.

sense.def: daily, every day; day in and day out; progressively generally: all the time

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: such is the way they dwindle day by day.

sense.def: dwindle

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: They grow dark, as though sealed with seals -

sense.def: be tied and sealed up

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: And when their minds draw near to death,

sense.def: come close to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: And when their minds draw near to death,

sense.def: death, also abstract: the fact of dying; mode of dying

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: nothing can restore them to the light.

sense.def: revert, go back to (a practice etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.2; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: nothing can restore them to the light.

sense.def: come to life; live

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.4; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: Joy, anger, grief, delight,

sense.def: musical performance; the practice of music; musical effect

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.4; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: - music from empty holes,

sense.def: emptiness, empty space; depletion; voidness;

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.4; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: day and night replacing each other before us,

sense.def: replace (someone or something); replace someone in (a place); refill (a place)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.4; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: and no one knows where they sprout from.

sense.def: in the evening; in the evenings

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.4; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: and no one knows where they sprout from.

sense.def: begin to arise, come into existence 未萌

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.4; Guo Qingfan 51; Wang Shumin 48; Fang Yong 41; Chen Guying 41; A.C. Graham 1981: 50

tls:text.tls:line: [It is enough that] morning and evening we have them,

sense.def: at dawn

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: Without them we would not exist;

sense.def: the "that"; the "other"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: Without them we would not exist;

sense.def: the Self, the Ego

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: without us they would have nothing to take hold of.

sense.def: the Self, the Ego

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: This comes close to the matter.

sense.def: come close to the relevant point

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: It would seem as though they have some True Master,

sense.def: true; genuine, not fake, not only apparent; veritable

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: and yet I find no trace of him.

sense.def: only, simply

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: He can act - that is certain.

sense.def: be reliably true, be trustworthy; be certainly the case

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: He can act - that is certain.

sense.def: definitely, "!"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: Yet I cannot see his form.

sense.def: abstract term for the concrete physical visible shape and manifestation of something [Note that paradoxically the notion of "concrete" is highly abstract.]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: He has identity but no form.

sense.def: genuine nature, essential nature, essence; esential tendencies

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.5; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: He has identity but no form.

sense.def: abstract term for the concrete physical visible shape and manifestation of something [Note that paradoxically the notion of "concrete" is highly abstract.]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: The hundred joints,

sense.def: human bones in the living body or as part of a skeleton

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: the nine openings,

sense.def: opening to the outside world, aperture; hollow; hole

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: the six organs,

sense.def: internal organs; viscera; innards; intestines

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: all come together and exist here [as my body].

sense.def: be provided; be all on hand

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: all come together and exist here [as my body].

sense.def: exist in; persist in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: all come together and exist here [as my body].

sense.def: be (still) around (in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: But which part should I feel closest to?

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: But which part should I feel closest to?

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: But there must be one I ought to favor more.

sense.def: or shall we, or should we?; or perhaps; either... or;Note OBI: 其 V 其弗 V: whether we V or not ZGC: 其不乎？ "or not?"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: But there must be one I ought to favor more.

sense.def: show personal and private favour towards, feel personally partial towards

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: But if they are all servants, then how can they keep order among themselves?

sense.def: or shall we, or should we?; or perhaps; either... or;Note OBI: 其 V 其弗 V: whether we V or not ZGC: 其不乎？ "or not?"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: Or do they take turns being lord and servant?

sense.def: or shall we, or should we?; or perhaps; either... or;Note OBI: 其 V 其弗 V: whether we V or not ZGC: 其不乎？ "or not?"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: Or do they take turns being lord and servant?

sense.def: acting for > for something; on someone's behalf; in someone's favour; for the sake of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: It would seem as though there must be some True Lord among them.

sense.def: true; genuine, not fake, not only apparent; veritable

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.6; Guo Qingfan 55; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: It would seem as though there must be some True Lord among them.

sense.def: be (still) around (in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.7; Guo Qingfan 56; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: But whether I succeed in discovering his identity or not,

sense.def: or (between verbals)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.7; Guo Qingfan 56; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: it neither adds to nor detracts from his Truth.

sense.def: be of benefit to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.7; Guo Qingfan 56; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: it neither adds to nor detracts from his Truth.

sense.def: do damage to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.2.7; Guo Qingfan 56; Wang Shumin 52; Fang Yong 45; Chen Guying 46; A.C. Graham 1981: 51

tls:text.tls:line: it neither adds to nor detracts from his Truth.

tls:text.tls:line: which is to say that "this" and "that" give birth to each other.

tls:text.tls:line: where there is birth there must be death;

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.3.7; Guo Qingfan 66; Wang Shumin 58; Fang Yong 50; Chen Guying:54; A.C. Graham 1981: 52

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: a sage; any sage (with tensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:line: is called the hinge of the Way.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: the useful is the passable;

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:text.tls:line: But to wear out your brain trying to make things into one

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.5.3; Guo Qingfan 79; Wang Shumin 70; Fang Yong 63; Chen Guying:71

sense.def: I, the author of this text

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.5.3; Guo Qingfan 79; Wang Shumin 70; Fang Yong 63; Chen Guying:71

tls:text.tls:line: So [I say] those who divide

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

sense.def: hold to one's chest (normally small objects)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.5.8; Guo Qingfan i3; Wang Shumin 72; Fang Yong 64; Chen Guying:74

tls:text.tls:line: So I say, those who discriminate

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.5.8; Guo Qingfan i3; Wang Shumin 72; Fang Yong 64; Chen Guying:74

tls:text.tls:line: Great Discriminations are not spoken;

sense.def: convincing eloquence; rhetoric; rhetorical polish; rhetorical skill

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.5.8; Guo Qingfan i3; Wang Shumin 72; Fang Yong 64; Chen Guying:74

tls:text.tls:line: Great Discriminations are not spoken;

sense.def: express oneself in words 能言; speak up; 提意見, come up with statements, come up with one's personal opinions; state one's personal opinion of things; make a proposal

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.5.9; Guo Qingfan i3; Wang Shumin 72; Fang Yong 64; Chen Guying:74

sense.def: illustrious

tls:text.tls:srcline: 庸詎知吾所謂知之非不知邪？

tls:text.tls:line: Chu Ch'ueh-tzu said to Chang Wu-tzu,

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.6.15; Guo Qingfan 97; Wang Shumin 85; Fang Yong 76; Chen Guying:i4

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius himself regarded these as wild and flippant words,

sense.def: statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.6.15; Guo Qingfan 97; Wang Shumin 85; Fang Yong 76; Chen Guying:i4

sense.def: you

tls:text.tls:line: so how could you expect Confucius to understand them?

sense.def: how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: I'm going to try speaking some reckless words

sense.def: express in words; put into words; explain (something) in fairly formal discourse or discussion, pronounce on formally; discuss (a matter); make explicit

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.6.17; Guo Qingfan 100; Wang Shumin 87; Fang Yong 76; Chen Guying:85

tls:text.tls:line: I'm going to try speaking some reckless words

sense.def: articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: the object(s), this, him; them; the other

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.6.25; Guo Qingfan 107; Wang Shumin 91; Fang Yong i1; Chen Guying:88

sense.def: and 衛侯逐公叔戍與其黨，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然則我與若與人俱不能相知也，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 2.6.26; Guo Qingfan 107; Wang Shumin 91; Fang Yong i1; Chen Guying:88

tls:text.tls:line: Obviously, then, neither you nor I nor anyone else can decide for each other.

sense.def: as well as, and in addition

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然則我與若與人俱不能相知也，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: listen with your mind.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: No, don't listen with your mind,

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but listen with your spirit.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but spirit

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: is empty- and waits on all things.

sense.def: emptiness, empty space; depletion; voidness;

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: The Way gathers in emptiness alone.

sense.def: assemble in the place N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Emptiness is the fasting of the mind."

sense.def: the cultivation of emptiness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.29; Guo Qingfan 147; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 110; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Emptiness is the fasting of the mind."

sense.def: pronoun an (often deverbal) abstract noun 虛者 "as for emptiness", 仁者 "as for benevolence".

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.30; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: I was certain that I was Hui. [[I did indeed considered myself to be Huí. CH]]

sense.def: from late Warring States times onwards: in actual fact, in point of fact; in reality; truly, in truth; indeed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.30; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Can this be called emptiness?"

sense.def: the cultivation of emptiness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: You may go and play in his bird cage,

sense.def: you (the object)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but never be moved by fame.

sense.def: you

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but never be moved by fame.

sense.def: cage

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: If he listens, then sing;

sense.def: be stimulated by, be affected by; allow oneself to be moved by

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: if not, keep still.

sense.def: be listened to, win through with (advice)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: if not, keep still.

sense.def: speak up

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Have no gate, no opening, 5

sense.def: be listened to, win through with (advice)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Have no gate, no opening, 5

sense.def: stop, fail to go on doing what one was doing; desist MOVE THESE TO THE NEXT LEXEME ENTRY

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Then you will be close to success.

sense.def: dwell in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.31; Guo Qingfan 148; Wang Shumin 130; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Then you will be close to success.

sense.def: inevitability

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: It is easy to keep from walking; [[To leave off making footprints is easy. ACG]]

sense.def: footprint; traces (some examples have to be moved to n(post-N) because that N can be omitted)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: the hard thing is to walk without touching the ground.

sense.def: walk on, take a walk on

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: the hard thing is to walk without touching the ground.

sense.def: floor, ground

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: It is easy to cheat when you work for men,

sense.def: envoy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: It is easy to cheat when you work for men,

sense.def: make use of; make proper or meaningful use of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: It is easy to cheat when you work for men,

sense.def: dissimulation, artifice, pretense

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but hard to cheat when you work for Heaven.

sense.def: envoy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but hard to cheat when you work for Heaven.

sense.def: make use of; make proper or meaningful use of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: You have heard of flying with wings,

sense.def: wings; also transferred military sense: the wings

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: You have heard of flying with wings,

sense.def: to fly; fly off

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: but you have never heard of flying without wings.

sense.def: wings; also transferred military sense: the wings

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

sense.def: look at!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.32; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Look into that closed room, [[emptiness CH]]

sense.def: emptiness

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.33; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Fortune and blessing gather where there is stillness.

sense.def: rest in a place N; take one's temporary abode in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.33; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Let your ears and eyes communicate with what is inside,

sense.def: cause N to V

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.33; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Then even gods and spirits will come to dwell,

sense.def: the ghosts and spirits (always in the plural, occasionally generic)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.33; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Then even gods and spirits will come to dwell,

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.1.33; Guo Qingfan 150; Wang Shumin 134; Fang Yong 111; Chen Guying 117

tls:text.tls:line: Then even gods and spirits will come to dwell,

sense.def: set up one's army camp; stop for the night

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Tzu-kao, duke of She,8 who was being sent on a mission to Ch'i,

sense.def: act as an envoy in/to N

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: consulted Confucius.

sense.def: 問於N曰 ZHUANG 問乎N曰

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'i will probably treat me with great honor

sense.def: me, as an envoy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: but will be in no hurry to do anything more.

sense.def: as a matter of fact, as far as I can see; probably, apparently; presumably; in my subjective view

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: but will be in no hurry to do anything more.

sense.def: will probably

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: but will be in no hurry to do anything more.

sense.def: （degree verb, see 甚敬）be morally earnest in one's behaviour and attitudes; show a respectful attitude

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: but will be in no hurry to do anything more.

sense.def: act with urgency; be in a hurry

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Even a commoner cannot be forced to act,

sense.def: an ordinary person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Even a commoner cannot be forced to act,

sense.def: not quite; not really

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Even a commoner cannot be forced to act,

sense.def: be moved; be changed; be made to change one's ways/mind

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.1; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: much less one of the feudal lords.

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: I am very worried about it.

sense.def: be fearful and worried about

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: You once said to me,

sense.def: at one point, once in the past, on one occasion; in the past; in questions: ever

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: You once said to me,

sense.def: postnominal particle after proper name objects

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: 'In all affairs, whether large or small,

sense.def: no matter whether

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: there are few men who reach a happy conclusion except through the Way.

sense.def: follow the proper Way; follow a definite method

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: there are few men who reach a happy conclusion except through the Way.

sense.def: joyfully, happily

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: there are few men who reach a happy conclusion except through the Way.

sense.def: joyfully, happily (sometimes with weak archaic suffix 言)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: If you do not succeed,

sense.def: if

tls:text.tls:srcline: 若成若不成而後无患者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.2; Guo Qingfan 152; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: To suffer no harm whether you succeed or not -

sense.def: no matter whether

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: I am a man who eats plain food that is simply cooked,

sense.def: conduct, carry out consistently; practise and advocate the use of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: I am a man who eats plain food that is simply cooked,

sense.def: (physically) rough, coarse, crude

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: so that no one ever complains of the heat in my kitchens.10

sense.def: state of chilliness, chill; fresh coolness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Yet this morning I received my orders from the king

sense.def: in the morning

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Yet this morning I received my orders from the king

sense.def: order to a certain person or group; a specific order

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: and by evening I am gulping ice water -

sense.def: icecold water

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: do you suppose I have developed some kind of internal fever?

sense.def: ", I wonder?"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: do you suppose I have developed some kind of internal fever?

sense.def: sentence final particle indicating a tentative modality: perhaps?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: I have not even gone to Ch'i to see what the situation is like

sense.def: continuative (See A.C. Graham's article on this.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: I have not even gone to Ch'i to see what the situation is like

sense.def: genuine nature, essential nature, essence; esential tendencies

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: As a minister, I am not capable of carrying out this mission.

sense.def: be capable of V-ing (NOT: be sufficient to V with)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.3; Guo Qingfan 153; Wang Shumin 136; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: But perhaps you have some advice you can give me . . ."

sense.def: ", I wonder?"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: "In the world, there are two great decrees: [[injunctions...CH]]

sense.def: injunction, precept; instructions

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: one is fate

sense.def: fate, destiny

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: and the other is duty."

sense.def: rectitude; moral principle; moral principles; moral duty, moral rectitude; proper moral duties

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: That a son should love his parents

sense.def: have loving feelings towards and take loving care of (superiors)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: That a son should love his parents

sense.def: parents, one's parents

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: you cannot erase this from his heart.

sense.def: untie> be removed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.4; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: is duty -

sense.def: rectitude; moral principle; moral principles; moral duty, moral rectitude; proper moral duties

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: there is no place he can go and be without his ruler, [[where someone isn't the ruler...??CH]]

sense.def: go to and get to a certain place; be on one's way to a certain place, head for

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: no place he can escape to between heaven and earth. [[escape from him...CH]]

sense.def: escape from; avoid by running away from; run away from, abscond from (difficulties, contracts etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, to serve your parents

sense.def: serve (as minister or aide, as one state another etc.), be in the service of; enter the services of; side with; specifically: serve and cultivate through gifts; attend to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, to serve your parents

sense.def: parents: father and mother

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: and be content to follow them anywhere-

sense.def: be choosy about, be particular about the choice of 擇友

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: and be content to do anything for him-

sense.def: settle peacefully in (a place), be at peace in (a place, also abstractly: a social position)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.5; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 122; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: this is the peak of loyalty.

sense.def: commitment; devoted effort, duty of loyal devotion; trustiness; the doing of one's loyal best 臣德也。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.6; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 123; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: And to serve your own mind

sense.def: one's own (object) 自多其力 "overestimate one's own strength"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.6; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 123; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: so that sadness or joy do not sway or move it;

sense.def: relative joyfulness or sadness; emotional reactions

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.6; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 123; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: to understand what you can do nothing about [[change places and continue yì...CH]]

sense.def: know that S, understand that S

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 4.2.6; Guo Qingfan 155; Wang Shumin 138; Fang Yong 123; Chen Guying 123

tls:text.tls:line: and to be content with it as with fate-this

sense.def: hero-like> heroically

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.1.8 Guo Qingfan 193; Wang Shumin 174; Fang Yong 148; Chen Guying 145

sense.def: even also; even (猶。。。何況)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.2.3 Guo Qingfan 197; Wang Shumin 177; Fang Yong 153; Chen Guying 150

sense.def: dust and dirt (often: of this world) 塵垢之外

tls:text.tls:line: only a man of virtue can do that.

sense.def: show a capacity for

sense.def: and 吾與汝俱不如也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今子與我遊於形骸之內，

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.2.6 Guo Qingfan 199; Wang Shumin 1i1; Fang Yong 153; Chen Guying 150

tls:text.tls:line: and he's never once let on that he's aware I'm missing a foot.

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.2.6 Guo Qingfan 199; Wang Shumin 1i1; Fang Yong 153; Chen Guying 150

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

sense.def: see (oneself)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.4.8 Guo Qingfan 212; Wang Shumin 190; Fang Yong 158; Chen Guying 157

tls:text.tls:line: loss, failure,

sense.def: failure

tls:text.tls:line: I was thinking too little of my own welfare and ruining the state.

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.5.3 Guo Qingfan 217; Wang Shumin 197; Fang Yong 163; Chen Guying 162

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 5.5.5 Guo Qingfan 217; Wang Shumin 197; Fang Yong 163; Chen Guying 163

tls:text.tls:line: right and wrong cannot get at him.
