tls:text.tls:line: The three men looked at each other and smiled.

sense.def: smile congenially in conversation etc. 相視而笑

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.3 Guo Qingfan 266; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: Joining their voices, they sang this song:

sense.def: sing a song with the words 歌曰

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.3 Guo Qingfan 266; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: You have gone back to your true form

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.4 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: The two men looked at each other and laughed.

sense.def: with a smile (amicably)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.4 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: The two men looked at each other and laughed.

sense.def: smile congenially in conversation etc. 相視而笑

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.4 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: "What does this man know of the meaning of ceremony?" they said.

sense.def: how? i.e. in no way!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.4 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: disregard their personal appearance

sense.def: physical shape including flesh and bones (sometimes considered as a heap or congeries of things constituting the dead body)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.4 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: and, without so much as changing the expression on their faces, sing in the very presence of the corpse!

sense.def: sing in mourning

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而丘使女往弔之，丘則陋矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.5 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: It was stupid of me to send you to offer condolences.

sense.def: offer condolences to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.5 Guo Qingfan 267; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: Even now they have joined with the Creator as men

sense.def: make up; fashion, create; invent QIMINYAOSHU 蔡倫立意造紙

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.6 Guo Qingfan 268; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: and upon death as the draining of a sore or the bursting of a boil.

sense.def: carbuncle

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.6 Guo Qingfan 268; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: They forget liver and gall,

sense.def: gallbladder, bile

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.7 Guo Qingfan 268; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: Idly they roam beyond the dust and dirt;

sense.def: dust and dirt (often: of this world) 塵垢之外

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.7 Guo Qingfan 268; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: Idly they roam beyond the dust and dirt;

sense.def: dirt, dust

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.7 Guo Qingfan 268; Wang Shumin 250; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 193

tls:text.tls:line: they wander free and easy in the service of inaction.

sense.def: roam in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.8 Guo Qingfan 271; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: "Well then, Master, what is this `realm' that you stick to?"

sense.def: depend on; rely on; rely on for sustenance or supportBUDDH: take refuge in (Buddha, dharma, sangha, etc.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.8 Guo Qingfan 271; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: Nevertheless, I will share with you what I have."

sense.def: and 吾與汝俱不如也

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.10 Guo Qingfan 273; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: "The singular man is

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.10 Guo Qingfan 273; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: the petty man of Heaven

sense.def: person of inferior social status or merely ordinary quality

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.10 Guo Qingfan 273; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: is a gentleman among men;

sense.def: be a person of superior character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.10 Guo Qingfan 273; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: the gentleman among men

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.6.10 Guo Qingfan 273; Wang Shumin 256; Fang Yong 197; Chen Guying 194

tls:text.tls:line: is the petty man of Heaven."

sense.def: be just an ordinary person;

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.1 Guo Qingfan 274; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 201; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: he wailed without shedding any tears,

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.1 Guo Qingfan 274; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 201; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: he did not grieve in his heart,

sense.def: in the bottom of heart, from the bottom of one's heart; sincerely

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.1 Guo Qingfan 274; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 201; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: he did not grieve in his heart,

sense.def: feel intense concern and solicitude, feel distress

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.1 Guo Qingfan 274; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 201; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: He fell down on these three counts,

sense.def: 是三者

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.3 Guo Qingfan 274; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: how does he know that he is really changing?

sense.def: how? i.e. in no way!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.3 Guo Qingfan 274; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: how does he know that he hasn't already changed?

sense.def: how? i.e. in no way!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.4 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: But in his case, though something may startle his body,

sense.def: body including skeleton

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.4 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: it won't injure his mind;

sense.def: inflict damage on

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.4 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: Meng-sun alone has waked up.

sense.def: especially; very; singularily; for the sole purpose

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.4 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: Men wail and so he wails, too -

sense.def: wail; lament

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.4 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: Men wail and so he wails, too -

sense.def: also (with omitted subject)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.4 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: that's the reason he acts like this.

sense.def: one's own; her own; his own

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: "What's more, we go around telling each other, I do this, I do that -

sense.def: Moreover; Moreover (by the way, as an additional thought)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: but how do we know that this `I' we talk about has any `I' to it?

sense.def: how?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: but how do we know that this `I' we talk about has any `I' to it?

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: but how do we know that this `I' we talk about has any `I' to it?

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: but how do we know that this `I' we talk about has any `I' to it?

sense.def: we

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: You dream you're a bird and soar up into the sky;

sense.def: moreover, and also; and, by the way; in any case

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.5 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: But now when you tell me about it,

sense.def: recognise that S; be aware of an event, know that something happened; be sure whether something is the case 不識 "I have no idea"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.6 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: Running around accusing others19 is not as good as laughing,

sense.def: get as far as V-ing, succeed V-ing, manage to V

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.7.6 Guo Qingfan 275; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 202; Chen Guying 199

tls:text.tls:line: Running around accusing others19 is not as good as laughing,

sense.def: go through the motions of a smile, cut a smiling face

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.2 Guo Qingfan 279; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: "Yao has already tattooed you with benevolence and righteousness

sense.def: mark out clearly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.2 Guo Qingfan 279; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: and cut off your nose with right and wrong.21

sense.def: amputate someone's nose

tls:text.tls:srcline: 汝將何以遊夫遙蕩恣睢轉徙之塗乎？」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.2 Guo Qingfan 279; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: Now how do you expect to go wandering in any far-away, carefree, and as-you-like-it paths?"

sense.def: into the far distance; from a far distance; in the far distance; into the distance

tls:text.tls:srcline: 汝將何以遊夫遙蕩恣睢轉徙之塗乎？」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.2 Guo Qingfan 279; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: Now how do you expect to go wandering in any far-away, carefree, and as-you-like-it paths?"

sense.def: "path" (of untrammelled evolution etc); right of way (MOVE THIS WHEN SEMANTIC CATEGORIES CAN BE CREATED AGAIN)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.2 Guo Qingfan 279; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: "But I would like if I may to wander in a little corner of them."

sense.def: border; frontier

tls:text.tls:srcline: 瞽者无以與乎青黃黼黻之觀。」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.3 Guo Qingfan 280; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: eyes with no pupils have no way to tell the beauty of colored and embroidered silks."

sense.def: be blind

tls:text.tls:srcline: 庸詎知夫造物者之不息我黥而補我劓，

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.4 Guo Qingfan 280; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: How do you know that the Creator will not wipe away my tattoo,

sense.def: how?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 庸詎知夫造物者之不息我黥而補我劓，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 庸詎知夫造物者之不息我黥而補我劓，

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.4 Guo Qingfan 280; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: How do you know that the Creator will not wipe away my tattoo,

sense.def: (black) tattoo (on the face of a criminal)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 庸詎知夫造物者之不息我黥而補我劓，

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.8.4 Guo Qingfan 280; Wang Shumin 258; Fang Yong 204; Chen Guying 202

tls:text.tls:line: How do you know that the Creator will not wipe away my tattoo,

sense.def: amputation of the nose

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.9.1 Guo Qingfan 2i2; Wang Shumin 268; Fang Yong 206; Chen Guying 205

tls:text.tls:line: "I'm improving!"

sense.def: make progress, improve oneself

sense.def: make progress, improve oneself

tls:text.tls:srcline:
它日，
復見，曰：
「回益矣。」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.9.2 Guo Qingfan 2i3; Wang Shumin 268; Fang Yong 206; Chen Guying 205

tls:text.tls:line: Another day, the two met again and Yen Hui said, "I'm improving! "

sense.def: make progress, improve oneself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.9.3 Guo Qingfan 2i4; Wang Shumin 268; Fang Yong 206; Chen Guying 205

tls:text.tls:line: "I smash up my limbs and body,

sense.def: cause to collapse> ruin and destroy; dismantle; ruin (a person)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.9.3 Guo Qingfan 2i4; Wang Shumin 268; Fang Yong 206; Chen Guying 205

tls:text.tls:line: "I smash up my limbs and body,

sense.def: limb (loan for 肢)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.9.3 Guo Qingfan 2i4; Wang Shumin 268; Fang Yong 206; Chen Guying 205

tls:text.tls:line: drive out perception and intellect,

sense.def: reduce

tls:text.tls:line: "What do you mean -

sense.def: sing

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 6.10.3 Guo Qingfan 286; Wang Shumin 271; Fang Yong 208; Chen Guying 208

tls:text.tls:line: "I was pondering what it is that has brought me to this extremity,

sense.def: extreme limit; ultimate point

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.1.2 Guo Qingfan 287; Wang Shumin 275; Fang Yong 212; Chen Guying 211

tls:text.tls:line: The clansman T'ai, now - he lay down peaceful and easy;

sense.def: sleep; find rest; be in bed; also of dogs: lie down to sleep

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.1.2 Guo Qingfan 287; Wang Shumin 275; Fang Yong 212; Chen Guying 211

sense.def: proceed very gently, slowly; going along gently

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.1.2 Guo Qingfan 287; Wang Shumin 275; Fang Yong 212; Chen Guying 211

tls:text.tls:line: he woke up wide-eyed and blank.

sense.def: be awake

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.2.3 Guo Qingfan 291; Wang Shumin 278; Fang Yong 214; Chen Guying 213

tls:text.tls:line: The field mouse burrows deep down under the sacred hill

sense.def: house mouse, domestic mouse

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.2.3 Guo Qingfan 291; Wang Shumin 278; Fang Yong 214; Chen Guying 213

tls:text.tls:line: where it won't have to worry about men digging and smoking it out.

sense.def: being smoked out

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.2.3 Guo Qingfan 291; Wang Shumin 278; Fang Yong 214; Chen Guying 213

tls:text.tls:line: Have you got less sense than these two little creatures?"

sense.def: how could?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.1 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: he happened to meet a Nameless Man.

sense.def: as it turned out in the event; by some coincidence 士適出 "this officer happened to leave the house".

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.1 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: he happened to meet a Nameless Man.

sense.def: run into a person, come to meet a person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.1 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: "Get away from me,

sense.def: unmarked imperative: leave! go away!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.1 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: you peasant!

sense.def: be a vulgar person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.2 Guo Qingfan 293; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: And if I get bored with that,

sense.def: be bored or become bored with something contextually determinate

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.2 Guo Qingfan 293; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: coming with this talk of governing the world and disturbing my mind?"

sense.def: belonging to me (personally), my (often marked by the genitive particle 之)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.2 Guo Qingfan 293; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: But T'ien Ken repeated his question.

sense.def: once again

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.3 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: "Let your mind wander in simplicity,

sense.def: the realm of peacefulness; serenity, tranquility

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.3 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: follow along with things the way they are,

sense.def: the natural tendencies of N; the natural properties of N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.3.3 Guo Qingfan 292; Wang Shumin 2i1; Fang Yong 216; Chen Guying 215

tls:text.tls:line: and make no room for personal views

sense.def: have room for, be able to accomodate

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.4.1 Guo Qingfan 295; Wang Shumin 2i4; Fang Yong 217; Chen Guying 217

tls:text.tls:line: "Here is a man

sense.def: a hypothetical place here

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.4.2 Guo Qingfan 296; Wang Shumin 2i4; Fang Yong 217; Chen Guying 217

tls:text.tls:line: They say it is the beautiful markings of the tiger and the leopard that call out the hunters,

sense.def: Moreover; Moreover (by the way, as an additional thought)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.4.2 Guo Qingfan 296; Wang Shumin 2i4; Fang Yong 217; Chen Guying 217

tls:text.tls:line: the nimbleness of the monkey

sense.def: monkey

tls:text.tls:line: the nimbleness of the monkey

sense.def: dexterity

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.4.3 Guo Qingfan 296; Wang Shumin 2i4; Fang Yong 217; Chen Guying 217

tls:text.tls:line: but appear not to be his own doing.

sense.def: OBI 3: come from

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.4.4 Guo Qingfan 296; Wang Shumin 2i4; Fang Yong 217; Chen Guying 217

tls:text.tls:line: but the people do not depend on him.

sense.def: rely on (what one holds in one's hands or more abstractly has); depend on; rely on the help of

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.4.4 Guo Qingfan 296; Wang Shumin 2i4; Fang Yong 217; Chen Guying 217

tls:text.tls:line: and wanders where there is nothing at all."

sense.def: wander about; be on a pleasure trip; take a pleasure trip; roam freely

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.5.1 Guo Qingfan 297; Wang Shumin 288; Fang Yong 219; Chen Guying 220

tls:text.tls:line: In Cheng there was a shaman of the gods

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.5.1 Guo Qingfan 297; Wang Shumin 288; Fang Yong 219; Chen Guying 220

tls:text.tls:line: In Cheng there was a shaman of the gods

sense.def: shamaness; (but note GUAN 女巫 ); generally: shaman; exorcist GY: 如是則明神降之〔六〕，在男曰覡，在女曰巫〔七〕。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 7.5.2 Guo Qingfan 297; Wang Shumin 288; Fang Yong 219; Chen Guying 220

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 8.2.6 Guo Qingfan 323; Wang Shumin 319; Fang Yong 238; Chen Guying 239

tls:text.tls:line: well, he had a bundle of writing slips and was reading a book.14

sense.def: bundle of bamboo strips for writing on; document; recordsbamboo or wooden strips woven together as a mat (the character 冊 depicts this). Ordinarily hemp was used for string, but silk could be used for especially valuable writings; perhaps leather ( 韋 ) was used in a similar way. On each strip were cut triangular indentations to keep the string in place. It was common to have two or three strings ( 編, 道 ). The last strip served as a center around which the 冊 was wrapped. On the back of the first strip the title of the 冊 could be written. Each strip could have a serial number. 冊 and 策 appear to be used interchangably, except that wheras 策 is a general word for strips of any length women in the above way, 策 (cf. its original meaning of "whip") is preferably made of rather long strips. 冊 is not used for counting written material. [JP]STATIONARY

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 8.2.12 Guo Qingfan 327; Wang Shumin 324; Fang Yong 243; Chen Guying 242

tls:text.tls:line: but finds no joy in what would bring joy to himself,

sense.def: feel happy about; consider as one's own happiness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 8.2.12 Guo Qingfan 327; Wang Shumin 324; Fang Yong 243; Chen Guying 242

tls:text.tls:line: I have a sense of shame before the Way and its Virtue,

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 8.2.12 Guo Qingfan 327; Wang Shumin 324; Fang Yong 243; Chen Guying 242

tls:text.tls:line: I have a sense of shame before the Way and its Virtue,

sense.def: be ashamed in front of, be ashamed vis-a-vis (also abstract values)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.2 Guo Qingfan 330; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 244

tls:text.tls:line: Then along comes Po Lo.1

sense.def: when it comes to the topic N

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.2 Guo Qingfan 330; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 244

sense.def: scrape, shave

sense.def: reins made of leather straps

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.2 Guo Qingfan 330; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 244

tls:text.tls:line: tie them up in stable and stall.

sense.def: tie together

tls:text.tls:line: tie them up in stable and stall.

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.4 Guo Qingfan 330; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 244

sense.def: work at, work professionally with; deal with properly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: In my opinion someone who was really good at handling the affairs of the world would not go about it like this.

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: The people have their constant inborn nature.

sense.def: those (slanderers etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: The people have their constant inborn nature.

sense.def: the people (with non-agentive predicate)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: The people have their constant inborn nature.

sense.def: invariant; constant; permanent, enduring, ever-lasting

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: The people have their constant inborn nature.

sense.def: natural inborn endowment, inborn nature, basic nature; natural condition, natural tendency; natural disposition, character; natural endowmentsBUDDH: in the Zen Buddhist context, xìng usually refers to one's 'Buddha-nature' (see fóxìng 佛性 ) (the inborn, naturally perfect and nature of each sentient being, overclouded (but not changed!) by the deluded activities of the mind)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: To weave for their clothing,

sense.def: engage in weaving cloth

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

sense.def: wear the contextually determinate garment

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

sense.def: do agricultural work; to plough the fields

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: to till for their food -

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.5 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 329; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: They are one in it and not partisan,

sense.def: be united, have a common purpose

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: form gang, conspire at lower social levels

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.6 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 335; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

sense.def: small winding footpath; paths; shortcut

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.6 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 335; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

sense.def: literary: wooden bridge; beam dam

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.7 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 335; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: So it happens that you can tie a cord to the birds and beasts and lead them about,

sense.def: be tied to something and thus restrained; be reined in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.7 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 335; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: So it happens that you can tie a cord to the birds and beasts and lead them about,

sense.def: be restrained, be reined in

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.7 Guo Qingfan 334; Wang Shumin 335; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:text.tls:line: Who then knows anything about "gentleman" or "petty man"?

sense.def: the petty people (often quantified: all)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.1.8 Guo Qingfan 336; Wang Shumin 335; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 246

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.2.1 Guo Qingfan 339; Wang Shumin 340; Fang Yong 248; Chen Guying 249

tls:text.tls:line: Pleased, they twine their necks together and rub;

sense.def: front of neck, throat; whole of neck

sense.def: allign, put side-by-side

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.2.3 Guo Qingfan 341; Wang Shumin 340; Fang Yong 249; Chen Guying 249

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 9.2.3 Guo Qingfan 341; Wang Shumin 340; Fang Yong 249; Chen Guying 249

sense.def: cause to be proper; to correct

tls:text.tls:line: only worrying that the cords and ropes, the locks and hasps are not fastened tightly enough.

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.5 Guo Qingfan 343; Wang Shumin 345; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 253

tls:text.tls:line: And was it only the state he stole?

sense.def: steal

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.5 Guo Qingfan 343; Wang Shumin 345; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 253

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, although Viscount T'ien Ch'eng gained the name of thief and bandit,

sense.def: a bandit 其人則盜賊也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故田成子有乎盜賊之名，

sense.def: in person, himself

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.7 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 255

sense.def: possibility; feasibility

tls:text.tls:srcline: 五者不備而能成大盜者，天下未之有也。

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.9 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: No one in the world ever succeeded in becoming a great thief if he didn't have all five!"

sense.def: 二者 "the two"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.10 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: so in fact the sage brings little benefit to the world,

sense.def: benefit; be profitable for; provide for the good of; work for the profit of, be of benefit to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.10 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: so in fact the sage brings little benefit to the world,

sense.def: there are few; be few 甚少

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.10 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: but much harm.

sense.def: be many; be abundant, be much; be more than enough; be in a majority

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.11 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: and let the thieves and bandits go their way;

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.11 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: and let the thieves and bandits go their way;

tls:text.tls:line: And if the sage is dead and gone,

sense.def: after, once (one) already has V-ed, after one has V-ed 以死誰懟

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.12 Guo Qingfan 346; Wang Shumin 349; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

sense.def: be tranquil and at peace together; keep the peace; make peace

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.13 Guo Qingfan 350; Wang Shumin 354; Fang Yong 260; Chen Guying 256

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.14 Guo Qingfan 350; Wang Shumin 354; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 256

tls:text.tls:line: Is this not a case of stealing benevolence and righteousness and the wisdom of the sages?

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.17 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 259

tls:text.tls:line: Destroy and wipe out the laws that the sage has made for the world,

sense.def: exhaust

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.17 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 259

tls:text.tls:line: Destroy and wipe out the laws that the sage has made for the world,

sense.def: destroy recklessly or cruelly, rout completely; ruin, spoil (crops)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.17 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 259

tls:text.tls:line: scatter the five colors,

sense.def: colour 五采

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.18 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 259

tls:text.tls:line: throw away the compass and square,

sense.def: compass and square

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.19 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 260

tls:text.tls:line: When men hold on to their hearing,

sense.def: hence: harbour inside one (any kinds of feelings or sentiments) [See also CONTAIN][CA]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.20 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 260

tls:text.tls:line: When men hold on to their wisdom,

sense.def: hence: harbour inside one (any kinds of feelings or sentiments) [See also CONTAIN][CA]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.1.20 Guo Qingfan 353; Wang Shumin 356; Fang Yong 261; Chen Guying 260

tls:text.tls:line: the world will no longer go awry.

sense.def: be deviant and depraved, unreglemented, unruly; extravagant

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.1 Guo Qingfan 357; Wang Shumin 360; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 262

tls:text.tls:line: Have you alone never heard of that age of Perfect Virtue?

sense.def: marker of rhetorical questions inviting or suggesting/presupposing a negative answer, derived from the meaning "as the only person"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.1 Guo Qingfan 357; Wang Shumin 360; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 262

tls:text.tls:line: the people knotted cords and used them."

sense.def: tie up; bundle together; (bind together > solidify)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.4 Guo Qingfan 357; Wang Shumin 360; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 262

tls:text.tls:line: This is the fault of men in high places who covet knowledge. 12

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion fishhooks, lures, seines, dragnets, trawls, and weirs,

sense.def: carpenter's hook; belt-hook; belt-buckle[also hook for fishing][CA]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion fishhooks, lures, seines, dragnets, trawls, and weirs,

sense.def: bait

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion fishhooks, lures, seines, dragnets, trawls, and weirs,

sense.def: net to catch fish with

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion fishhooks, lures, seines, dragnets, trawls, and weirs,

sense.def: originally net-trap for catching fish, later geneal term for a net

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion fishhooks, lures, seines, dragnets, trawls, and weirs,

sense.def: SHIJI: fish net

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion fishhooks, lures, seines, dragnets, trawls, and weirs,

sense.def: bamboo fish trap

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion pitfalls, snares, cages, traps, and gins,

sense.def: net for catching birds

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion pitfalls, snares, cages, traps, and gins,

sense.def: pitfall

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion pitfalls, snares, cages, traps, and gins,

sense.def: net for catching hares

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.6 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 267; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: Knowledge enables men to fashion pitfalls, snares, cages, traps, and gins,

sense.def: ZZ 362: net for catching rabbits, and by extension other animals

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.8 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 268; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: There is no insect that creeps and crawls,

sense.def: weak and soft; pliable

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舍夫種種之民，而悅夫役役之佞，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.9 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 268; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: shoving aside the pure and artless people and delighting in busy, bustling flatterers;

sense.def: sundry; all kinds of, various, many, all sorts of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舍夫種種之民，而悅夫役役之佞，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.9 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 268; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: shoving aside the pure and artless people and delighting in busy, bustling flatterers;

sense.def: flatterer; the psychophantic 四佞

tls:text.tls:srcline: 釋夫恬淡无為而悅夫啍啍之意，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 10.2.9 Guo Qingfan 359; Wang Shumin 362; Fang Yong 268; Chen Guying 263

tls:text.tls:line: abandoning the limpidity and calm of inaction and delighting in jumbled and jangling ideas.

sense.def: tranquility; spiritual ease; detachment

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.1 Guo Qingfan 364; Wang Shumin 371; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 268

tls:text.tls:line: You let it be

sense.def: nominaliser and topic marker

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.1 Guo Qingfan 364; Wang Shumin 371; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 268

tls:text.tls:line: you leave it alone

sense.def: nominaliser and topic marker

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.2 Guo Qingfan 364; Wang Shumin 371; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 268

tls:text.tls:line: and there was no contentment anywhere.

sense.def: be mildly happy; be amused; be happily at ease; feel contentment

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.3 Guo Qingfan 365; Wang Shumin 371; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 268

tls:text.tls:line: and this in turn will do harm to the bodies of men.

sense.def: body; physical appearance (mostly n(post-N))

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是乎天下始喬詰卓鷙，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.4 Guo Qingfan 365; Wang Shumin 371; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 268

tls:text.tls:line: Then for the first time the world grows restless and aspiring,1

sense.def: then, thereupon; at that moment

tls:text.tls:srcline: 彼何暇安其性命之情哉！

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.5 Guo Qingfan 365; Wang Shumin 371; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 268

tls:text.tls:line: How could people have any leisure to rest in the true form of their inborn nature and fate!

sense.def: Whenever? At what time? i.e. never

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.7 Guo Qingfan 367; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: they are aiding artificiality.

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.10 Guo Qingfan 367; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 274; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: What's to be done about it I'm sure I don't know!

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故君子不得已而臨莅天下，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.11 Guo Qingfan 369; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 275; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: If the gentleman finds he has no other choice than to direct and look after the world,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.11 Guo Qingfan 369; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 275; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: If he values his own body more than the management of the world,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.12 Guo Qingfan 369; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 275; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: If he is more careful of his own body than of the management of the world,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故君子苟能无解其五藏，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.12 Guo Qingfan 369; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 275; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: If the gentleman can in truth keep from rending apart his five vital organs,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.13 Guo Qingfan 369; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 275; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: gentle and easy in inaction,

sense.def: do as one pleases, act naturally; be easy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.1.13 Guo Qingfan 369; Wang Shumin 375; Fang Yong 275; Chen Guying 271

tls:text.tls:line: "What leisure have I now for governing the world?" he will say.

sense.def: Whenever? At what time? i.e. never

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.2 Guo Qingfan 371; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: it has twice swept over the four seas and beyond.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.2 Guo Qingfan 371; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: it has twice swept over the four seas and beyond.

sense.def: reach for; reach for (so as to drink)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.3 Guo Qingfan 371; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: racing and galloping out of reach of all bonds.

sense.def: be tied to something and thus restrained; be reined in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.4 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: Yao and Shun followed him and worked till there was no more down on their thighs,

sense.def: N then V-ed; N thus V-ed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.5 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: and so they had to exile Huan Tou to Mount Ch'ung,

sense.def: N therefore VERBed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.6 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: Then joy and anger eyed each other with suspicion,

sense.def: for this reason, and thus, and so

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.6 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: falsehood and truth slandered one another,

sense.def: the boastful, those given to exaggeration

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.6 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 273

tls:text.tls:line: falsehood and truth slandered one another,

sense.def: ridicule

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.7 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 274

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred clans were thrown into turmoil.5

sense.def: the people

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.7 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 274

tls:text.tls:line: Then there were axes and saws to shape things,

sense.def: thereafter, from then on, from that point onwards

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故賢者伏處大山嵁巖之下，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.8 Guo Qingfan 373; Wang Shumin 379; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 274

tls:text.tls:line: So it was that worthy men crouched in hiding below the great mountains and yawning cliffs,

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其无愧而不知恥也甚矣！

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.9 Guo Qingfan 377; Wang Shumin 385; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 274

tls:text.tls:line: that they should be so brazen, so lacking in any sense of shame!

sense.def: sense of shame

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其无愧而不知恥也甚矣！

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.9 Guo Qingfan 377; Wang Shumin 385; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 274

tls:text.tls:line: that they should be so brazen, so lacking in any sense of shame!

sense.def: the (proper) sense of what is publicly disgraceful, moral integrity

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吾未知聖知之不為桁楊椄槢也，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.2.10 Guo Qingfan 377; Wang Shumin 385; Fang Yong 279; Chen Guying 274

tls:text.tls:line: Who can convince me that sagely wisdom is not in fact the wedge that fastens the cangue,

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.1 Guo Qingfan 379; Wang Shumin 387; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 278

tls:text.tls:line: The Yellow Emperor had ruled as Son of Heaven for nineteen years

sense.def: be the Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.2 Guo Qingfan 379; Wang Shumin 387; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 278

tls:text.tls:line: I would also like to control the yin and yang

sense.def: govern, take responsibility for; hold office in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.3 Guo Qingfan 380; Wang Shumin 387; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 278

tls:text.tls:line: but what you say you want to control

sense.def: govern, take responsibility for; hold office in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.3 Guo Qingfan 380; Wang Shumin 387; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 278

tls:text.tls:line: the plants and trees shed their leaves before they have even turned yellow,

sense.def: (of trees) shed one's leaves; fall down and wither; fall on the ground (fruits)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.3 Guo Qingfan 380; Wang Shumin 387; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 278

tls:text.tls:line: what good would it do to tell you about the Perfect Way!"

sense.def: how? in what way

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.4 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: Master Kuang Ch'eng was lying with his face to the south. 7

sense.def: sleep; find rest; be in bed; also of dogs: lie down to sleep

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.4 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: crept forward on his knees,

sense.def: on one's knees

tls:text.tls:srcline: 敢問，治身柰何而可以長久？」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.5 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: I venture to ask about the governing of the body. What should I do in order to live a long life?"

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.5 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: "Excellent, this question of yours!

sense.def: 大哉問form of words used to ask a question; question uttered

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.5 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: Come,

sense.def: Exclamatory, slightly transferred sense: come to a contextually determinate place (i.e. the place where the speaker currently is)!> come along!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.8 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: You have only to take care and guard your own body;

sense.def: familiar possessive your

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.8 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: You have only to take care and guard your own body;

sense.def: N's own personality; N's own personal convictions; N's own personal character??, N's own personal characteristics; the very person constituted by N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.8 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: these other things will of themselves grow sturdy.

sense.def: become strong; grow strong; increase in strength; reach one's full strength

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.9 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore I have kept myself alive for twelve hundred years,

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.9 Guo Qingfan 3i1; Wang Shumin 389; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore I have kept myself alive for twelve hundred years,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.10 Guo Qingfan 3i3; Wang Shumin 392; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: "Come,

sense.def: Exclamatory, slightly transferred sense: come to a contextually determinate place (i.e. the place where the speaker currently is)!> come along!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.10 Guo Qingfan 3i3; Wang Shumin 392; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: I will explain to you.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.10 Guo Qingfan 3i3; Wang Shumin 392; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: I will explain to you.

sense.def: talk with, engage in conversation with 相語, 與x共語

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.11 Guo Qingfan 3i3; Wang Shumin 392; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: though he may see the light above him,

sense.def: light; brightness; glint

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.11 Guo Qingfan 3i3; Wang Shumin 392; Fang Yong 2i4; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: So I will take leave of you,

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.3.12 Guo Qingfan 3i4; Wang Shumin 392; Fang Yong 285; Chen Guying 279

tls:text.tls:line: to form a triad with the light of the sun and moon,

sense.def: light; brightness; glint

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.3 Guo Qingfan 386; Wang Shumin 394; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: "I would like to ask a question," said Cloud Chief.

sense.def: CC: I

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.5 Guo Qingfan 387; Wang Shumin 394; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: "Heavenly Master, have you forgotten me?

sense.def: non-honorific?? me

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.6 Guo Qingfan 388; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: demented drifting does not know where it goes.

sense.def: OBI: set out for; be on one's way; go along to; go to GUAN: 往之, 所往

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.6 Guo Qingfan 388; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: What more do I know?"

sense.def: CC: I

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.7 Guo Qingfan 388; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: "I too consider myself a demented drifter,

sense.def: CC: I

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.7 Guo Qingfan 388; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: but the people follow me wherever I go

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.7 Guo Qingfan 388; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: but the people follow me wherever I go

sense.def: OBI: set out for; be on one's way; go along to; go to GUAN: 往之, 所往

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.7 Guo Qingfan 388; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 288; Chen Guying 2i3

tls:text.tls:line: and I have no choice but to think of them.

sense.def: CC: I

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.10 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: "Well, then -

sense.def: negative: oh!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.10 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: and things will transform themselves.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.11 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: Smash your form and body,

sense.def: your

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.11 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: Smash your form and body,

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.11 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: spit out hearing and eyesight,

sense.def: spit out and utter (words, in a hurry)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.11 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: spit out hearing and eyesight,

sense.def: intelligence

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.11 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: be blank and soulless,

sense.def: soul

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.13 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: "The Heavenly Master has favored me with this Virtue,

sense.def: non-honorific?? me

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.13 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: instructed me in this Silence.

sense.def: non-honorific?? me

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.4.13 Guo Qingfan 390; Wang Shumin 396; Fang Yong 289; Chen Guying 2i4

tls:text.tls:line: All my life I have been looking for it,

sense.def: in person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.5.2 Guo Qingfan 392; Wang Shumin 402; Fang Yong 293; Chen Guying 288

tls:text.tls:line: for, no matter how much you may know, it can never match the many talents of the crowd combined.

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.5.3 Guo Qingfan 392; Wang Shumin 402; Fang Yong 293; Chen Guying 288

tls:text.tls:line: that the possessors of states do not realize this!

sense.def: rulers over land

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈獨治天下百姓而已哉！

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.5.4 Guo Qingfan 394; Wang Shumin 402; Fang Yong 293; Chen Guying 288

tls:text.tls:line: how could he be content only to govern the hundred clans of the world and do nothing more?

sense.def: 天下白性

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.5.5 Guo Qingfan 394; Wang Shumin 402; Fang Yong 293; Chen Guying 288

sense.def: the six elements constrututing the universe; the whole world in all its dimensions from east to west, south to north, below to above

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.5.5 Guo Qingfan 394; Wang Shumin 402; Fang Yong 293; Chen Guying 288

sense.def: the nine regions of the world 揚州，梁州，青州，冀州，雍州，豫州，徐州，兗州，荊州

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: His face and form16

sense.def: physical frame

sense.def: see clearly, make out, catch sight of; notice, perceive; be able to recognise

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 11.5.8 Guo Qingfan 395; Wang Shumin 405; Fang Yong 293; Chen Guying 288

sense.def: be a person of superior character

tls:text.tls:line: He who fixes his eyes on nothingness -

sense.def: see clearly, make out, catch sight of; notice, perceive; be able to recognise

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

sense.def: be on a par; be equal; be equable

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.1.5 Guo Qingfan 404; Wang Shumin 413; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 295

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.2.1 Guo Qingfan 406; Wang Shumin 413; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 297

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman must pluck out his mind!

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.2.2 Guo Qingfan 406; Wang Shumin 413; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 298

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.2.2 Guo Qingfan 406; Wang Shumin 413; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 298

sense.def: flow abundantly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.2.3 Guo Qingfan 406; Wang Shumin 413; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 298

sense.def: consider as glorious; feel elated by; find tremendous, be full of admiration for; take pride in

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.2.3 Guo Qingfan 406; Wang Shumin 413; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 298

tls:text.tls:line: no shame in poverty.

sense.def: characteristic of a true king, truly royal, royal

sense.def: find it publicly unacceptable to V; find it a public disgrace to V, feel it to be a public disgrace that one Vs

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.3.2 Guo Qingfan 411; Wang Shumin 421; Fang Yong 303; Chen Guying 300

sense.def: be broad of vision and ambition

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.5.3 Guo Qingfan 416; Wang Shumin 426; Fang Yong 312; Chen Guying 303

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.5.4 Guo Qingfan 416; Wang Shumin 426; Fang Yong 312; Chen Guying 303

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.5.4 Guo Qingfan 416; Wang Shumin 426; Fang Yong 312; Chen Guying 303

tls:text.tls:line: He will worship knowledge and chase after it with the speed of fire.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: where there are machine worries,

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.4 Guo Qingfan 433; Wang Shumin 444; Fang Yong 325; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: With a machine heart in your breast,

sense.def: exist in; persist in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.4 Guo Qingfan 433; Wang Shumin 444; Fang Yong 325; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: With a machine heart in your breast,

sense.def: chest; the seat of thoughts

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.5 Guo Qingfan 433; Wang Shumin 444; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: I would be ashamed to use it!"

sense.def: feel personally ashamed to V

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.6 Guo Qingfan 434; Wang Shumin 444; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: Tzu-kung blushed with chagrin,

sense.def: feel embarrassed 大慚

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.6 Guo Qingfan 434; Wang Shumin 444; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: looked down, and made no reply.

sense.def: reply (politely), make a polite reply to a contextually determinate person; give a required reply (not necessarily to a superior)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.7 Guo Qingfan 435; Wang Shumin 445; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: "Who are you, anyway?"

sense.def: who

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.9 Guo Qingfan 435; Wang Shumin 445; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

sense.def: garden, typically gardened by a gardener, not necessarily with a fence

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.9 Guo Qingfan 435; Wang Shumin 445; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: break up your body and limbs -

sense.def: cause to collapse> ruin and destroy; dismantle; ruin (a person)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.9 Guo Qingfan 435; Wang Shumin 445; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: break up your body and limbs -

sense.def: physical shape including flesh and bones (sometimes considered as a heap or congeries of things constituting the dead body)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.9 Guo Qingfan 435; Wang Shumin 445; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: You don't even know how to look after your own body -

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.9 Guo Qingfan 435; Wang Shumin 445; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 318

tls:text.tls:line: how do you have any time to think about looking after the world!

sense.def: Whenever? At what time? i.e. never

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.11 Guo Qingfan 436; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: One of his disciples said,

sense.def: an (identifiabe) disciple, the disciple

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.11 Guo Qingfan 436; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: "Who was that man just now?

sense.def: past; just now (as in "the man just now")

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.11 Guo Qingfan 436; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: "Who was that man just now?

sense.def: be who?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫子何故見之變容失色，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.11 Guo Qingfan 436; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: Why did you change your expression and lose your color like that, Master,

sense.def: characteristic appearance; physiognomy (also of things generally) bodily comportment, physical expression; especially as expressive of inner mood or personality

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.15 Guo Qingfan 436; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: are no loss or gain to him.

sense.def: inflict damage on

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.17 Guo Qingfan 438; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: As for the arts of Mr. Chaos, you and I need not bother to find out about them."

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.17 Guo Qingfan 438; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: As for the arts of Mr. Chaos, you and I need not bother to find out about them."

sense.def: how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.11.17 Guo Qingfan 438; Wang Shumin 450; Fang Yong 326; Chen Guying 319

tls:text.tls:line: As for the arts of Mr. Chaos, you and I need not bother to find out about them."

sense.def: get an idea of, get any idea of; get wind of, notice

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.12.4 Guo Qingfan 440; Wang Shumin 453; Fang Yong 330; Chen Guying 323

tls:text.tls:line: dip from and it never runs dry.

sense.def: ladle from (a wine vessel)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.12.8 Guo Qingfan 441; Wang Shumin 455; Fang Yong 330; Chen Guying 324

tls:text.tls:line: "The man of Virtue

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 四海之內共利之之謂悅，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.12.8 Guo Qingfan 441; Wang Shumin 455; Fang Yong 330; Chen Guying 324

tls:text.tls:line: To share profit with all things within the four seas is his happiness,

sense.def: happy contentment

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.12.9 Guo Qingfan 441; Wang Shumin 455; Fang Yong 330; Chen Guying 324

tls:text.tls:line: This is called the manner of the man of Virtue."

sense.def: this (aforementioned utterance, or quotation)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.12.9 Guo Qingfan 441; Wang Shumin 455; Fang Yong 330; Chen Guying 324

tls:text.tls:line: This is called the manner of the man of Virtue."

sense.def: characteristic appearance; physiognomy (also of things generally) bodily comportment, physical expression; especially as expressive of inner mood or personality

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.12.11 Guo Qingfan 442; Wang Shumin 456; Fang Yong 330; Chen Guying 324

tls:text.tls:line: "He lets his spirit ascend and mount upon the light;

sense.def: light; brightness; glint

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.13.3 Guo Qingfan 444; Wang Shumin 458; Fang Yong 332; Chen Guying 326

tls:text.tls:line: But to wait until you go bald and then buy a wig,

sense.def: SHI: wig, false hair

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.13.3 Guo Qingfan 444; Wang Shumin 458; Fang Yong 332; Chen Guying 326

tls:text.tls:line: to wait until you get sick and then call for a doctor,

sense.def: medical treatment; medical practice

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.13.3 Guo Qingfan 444; Wang Shumin 458; Fang Yong 332; Chen Guying 326

tls:text.tls:line: to prepare the medicine like a true filial son

sense.def: loving, caring 慈母, benevolent, kin

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.13.3 Guo Qingfan 444; Wang Shumin 458; Fang Yong 332; Chen Guying 326

tls:text.tls:line: wearing a grim and haggard look - this the true sage would be ashamed to do.

sense.def: find personally shameful; find something personally, psychologically and morally unbearable and shameful, be embarrassed by

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.13.4 Guo Qingfan 445; Wang Shumin 458; Fang Yong 332; Chen Guying 327

tls:text.tls:line: They love one another but they do not know that this is benevolence.

sense.def: love (each other)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.1 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 334; Chen Guying 328

tls:text.tls:line: When a filial son does not fawn on his parents,

sense.def: flatter

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.1 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 334; Chen Guying 328

tls:text.tls:line: when a loyal minister does not flatter his lord,

sense.def: curry favour with (a superior) through sycophancy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.2 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 328

tls:text.tls:line: he is not, as you might expect, called a sycophant and a flatterer.

sense.def: flattering speech

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.3 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: See him spread out his robes,

sense.def: clothes; robes (as gifts); upper and lower garments; garments of all kinds

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.3 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: See him spread out his robes,

sense.def: SHI: lower garment (particularly those worn below the yī 衣 "upper clothes" 毛傳：在下曰裳)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.3 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: display his bright colors,

sense.def: all sorts of (fancy) colours

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.3 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: put on a solemn face

sense.def: comportment and appearance

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.3 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: in hopes of currying favor with the age -

sense.def: flatter, curry favour with, ingratiate oneself with 虎...媚養己者; beguile, German bezirzen.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.3 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: and yet he does not recognize himself as a sycophant or a flatterer.

sense.def: flatterer

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.5 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: The man in the worst confusion

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.5 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: the biggest fool

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.5 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: will end his life without ever seeing the light.

sense.def: become supremely intelligent; become quick-witted

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.6 Guo Qingfan 447; Wang Shumin 459; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: no matter how often I point the way,

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.7 Guo Qingfan 450; Wang Shumin 462; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: Great music is lost on the ears of the villagers,

sense.def: music; a piece of music

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.7 Guo Qingfan 450; Wang Shumin 462; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: and they grin from ear to car.

sense.def: laugh as a sign that one is amused by what one experiences

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.7 Guo Qingfan 450; Wang Shumin 462; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: what good does it do?

sense.def: how 庸知

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.8 Guo Qingfan 450; Wang Shumin 462; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: at least I won't cause anyone any worry.

sense.def: whom

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.8 Guo Qingfan 450; Wang Shumin 462; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: she rushes to fetch a torch and examine it,

sense.def: at once, immediately; all at once; abruptly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.14.8 Guo Qingfan 450; Wang Shumin 462; Fang Yong 335; Chen Guying 329

tls:text.tls:line: she rushes to fetch a torch and examine it,

sense.def: quickly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.1 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: is hacked up to make bowls for the sacrificial wine,

sense.def: large three-legged round container for wine with decorations

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.1 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: yet they are alike in having lost their inborn nature.

sense.def: in relation to, within the field of, etc

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.2 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: Two: when the five notes confuse the ear

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.2 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: Three: when the five odors stimulate the nose

sense.def: nose

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.3 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: This is not what I call getting hold of something.

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.3 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: This is not what I call getting hold of something.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.3 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: This is not what I call getting hold of something.

sense.def: we

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.4 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: If so, then the pigeons and doves in their cage

sense.def: If so, then

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.4 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: If so, then the pigeons and doves in their cage

sense.def: cage; bird's cage

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.4 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: with leather caps and snipe-feathered bonnets, batons stuck in belts and sashes trailing,

sense.def: leather official hat

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.4 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: with leather caps and snipe-feathered bonnets, batons stuck in belts and sashes trailing,

sense.def: insert (something N1) into (something else N2)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.4 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: with leather caps and snipe-feathered bonnets, batons stuck in belts and sashes trailing,

sense.def: wooden tablet inscribed with duties at court; ritual 笏 were made of jade

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.5 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: The inside hemmed in by pickets and pegs,

sense.def: made of firewood

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.5 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: The inside hemmed in by pickets and pegs,

sense.def: fence; railing; hedge

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.5 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: If so, then the condemned men with their chained wrists and manacled fingers,

sense.def: then [I collect here the cases where I have so far not found it plausible or easy to attribute to shì a clear anaphoric reference.]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.5 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: the tiger and the leopard in their pens and prisons

sense.def: SHI: sack

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 12.15.5 Guo Qingfan 453; Wang Shumin 464; Fang Yong 338; Chen Guying 332

tls:text.tls:line: the tiger and the leopard in their pens and prisons

sense.def: pen; shed for wild beasts or for domestic animals; fenced enclosure

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.2 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: the actions of such a man come naturally;

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.3 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: Water that is still gives back a clear image of beard and eyebrows;

sense.def: beard; whiskers

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.3 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: Water that is still gives back a clear image of beard and eyebrows;

sense.def: eyebrow

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.3 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: the glass of the ten thousand things.

sense.def: mirror (always concrete in pre-Buddhist times, but not later)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫虛靜恬淡寂漠无為者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.4 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: Emptiness, stillness, limpidity, silence, inaction -

sense.def: tranquility; spiritual ease; detachment

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.4 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: the substance of the Way and its Virtue.

sense.def: internominal "and": rare and problematic usage...

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫虛靜恬淡寂漠无為者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.6 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: Emptiness, stillness, limpidity, silence, inaction

sense.def: tranquility; spiritual ease; detachment

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.1.7 Guo Qingfan 457; Wang Shumin 471; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 337

tls:text.tls:line: Come forward with them to succor the age

sense.def: pacify, console

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.2 Guo Qingfan 462; Wang Shumin 475; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: he covers heaven, bears up the earth, carves and fashions countless forms,

sense.def: cover in order to protect what is covered, or sometimes to hide discreetly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.6 Guo Qingfan 463; Wang Shumin 475; Fang Yong 345; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: Heavenly joy

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.7 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: takes Heaven and earth as its ancestor,

sense.def: the main point made by a text or a person, the main thing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.7 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: the Way and its Virtue as its master,

sense.def: the most important point; the essential thing, the main thing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.7 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: inaction as its constant rule.

sense.def: what is constant; constant principle

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.10 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: did not of themselves lay plans;

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.10 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: they did not of themselves expound any theories;

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.10 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: they did not of themselves act.

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.11 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven does not give birth,

sense.def: give birth; produce

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.11 Guo Qingfan 465; Wang Shumin 476; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: yet the ten thousand things are nourished.

sense.def: be nurtured; be raised; be properly nurtured

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.13 Guo Qingfan 467; Wang Shumin 479; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: The source rests with the superior,

sense.def: what is basic and crucial; the basic and crucial feature; basic features; primary consideration

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.13 Guo Qingfan 467; Wang Shumin 479; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: the trivia with the inferior;

sense.def: what is not basic; what is marginal; what comes at the end (and not at the beginning); mere marginal symptoms (as opposed to real basic causes); non-basic professions other than military and agricultural

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.13 Guo Qingfan 467; Wang Shumin 479; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: the essential resides in the ruler,

sense.def: the vital point; most important point. essential point; essence; main initiative; main controlling functions

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 13.2.13 Guo Qingfan 467; Wang Shumin 479; Fang Yong 346; Chen Guying 340

tls:text.tls:line: the details in his ministers.
