sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.6 Guo Qingfan 610; Wang Shumin 639; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: but not good enough to save their lives.

sense.def: keep (oneself) alive

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.6 Guo Qingfan 610; Wang Shumin 639; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: but not good enough to save their lives.

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故夫子胥爭之以殘其形，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.6 Guo Qingfan 610; Wang Shumin 639; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: Tzu-hsu wrangled and lost his body.2

sense.def: destroy recklessly or cruelly, rout completely; ruin, spoil (crops)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故夫子胥爭之以殘其形，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.6 Guo Qingfan 610; Wang Shumin 639; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: Tzu-hsu wrangled and lost his body.2

sense.def: body; physical appearance (mostly n(post-N))

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.7 Guo Qingfan 611; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: What ordinary people do and what they find happiness in -

sense.def: feel deeply communictively happy with or in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.7 Guo Qingfan 611; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: I don't know whether such happiness is in the end really happiness

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.7 Guo Qingfan 611; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: they all say they're happy with it.

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.7 Guo Qingfan 611; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: I'm not happy with it and I'm not unhappy with it.

sense.def: may he be communicatively happy, the N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.7 Guo Qingfan 611; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: In the end is there really happiness or isn't there?

sense.def: feel deeply communictively happy with or in

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.8

tls:text.tls:line: In the end is there really happiness or isn't there?

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.8

tls:text.tls:line: perfect happiness knows no happiness,

sense.def: perfect happiness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.8

tls:text.tls:line: perfect happiness knows no happiness,

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 至樂

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.9 Guo Qingfan 612; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: Perfect happiness, keeping alive -

sense.def: perfect happiness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.9 Guo Qingfan 612; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: Perfect happiness, keeping alive -

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 至樂

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.9 Guo Qingfan 612; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: Perfect happiness, keeping alive -

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.1.9 Guo Qingfan 612; Wang Shumin 642; Fang Yong 464; Chen Guying 446

tls:text.tls:line: Let me try putting it this way.

sense.def: may I ask (for myself ) to V> please let me [short and idiomatic for 臣請]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.1 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: Chuang Tzu's wife died.

sense.def: main wife of N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.1 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: When Hui Tzu went to convey his condolences,

sense.def: offer condolences to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子則方箕踞鼓盆而歌。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.1 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: he found Chuang Tzu sitting with his legs sprawled out, pounding on a tub and singing.

sense.def: sit informally with one's bottom on the floor and with one's legs spread out to the sides

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子則方箕踞鼓盆而歌。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.1 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: he found Chuang Tzu sitting with his legs sprawled out, pounding on a tub and singing.

sense.def: knock (bell etc); strike (a note on a drum)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子則方箕踞鼓盆而歌。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.1 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: he found Chuang Tzu sitting with his legs sprawled out, pounding on a tub and singing.

sense.def: basin, tub

tls:text.tls:srcline: 莊子則方箕踞鼓盆而歌。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.1 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: he found Chuang Tzu sitting with his legs sprawled out, pounding on a tub and singing.

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.2 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: But pounding on a tub and singing -

sense.def: knock (bell etc); strike (a note on a drum)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.2.2 Guo Qingfan 614; Wang Shumin 645; Fang Yong 468; Chen Guying 450

tls:text.tls:line: But pounding on a tub and singing -

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.1 Guo Qingfan 615; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: Suddenly a willow sprouted out of Uncle Lame-Gait's left elbow.4

sense.def: after a while, unpredictably, suddenly; then suddenly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.1 Guo Qingfan 615; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: Suddenly a willow sprouted out of Uncle Lame-Gait's left elbow.4

sense.def: elbow

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: "No-what is there to resent?" said Uncle Lame-Gait.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: "To live is to borrow.

sense.def: borrowing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: then life must be a pile of trash.

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: then life must be a pile of trash.

sense.def: defilements

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: then life must be a pile of trash.

sense.def: dirt, dust

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: Life and death are day and night.

sense.def: generally: day and night

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: You and I came to watch the process of change,

sense.def: and 吾與汝俱不如也

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.3.2 Guo Qingfan 616; Wang Shumin 647; Fang Yong 469; Chen Guying 452

tls:text.tls:line: and now change has caught up with me.

sense.def: substantial and typically irreversible transformation into something new; natural transformation

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.1 Guo Qingfan 617; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 453

tls:text.tls:line: he saw an old skull,

sense.def: empty; empty of relevant content (an empty pond, for example, may be just empty of fish etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.1 Guo Qingfan 617; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 453

tls:text.tls:line: he saw an old skull,

sense.def: ZHUANG: skull [note the assonance in this name: repetition of "oo"]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.2 Guo Qingfan 617; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: Did you do some evil deed

sense.def: or else

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.2 Guo Qingfan 617; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: and were you ashamed to bring disgrace upon your parents and family,

sense.def: feel ashamed/embarrassed vis-a-vis; feel embarrassed about 甚愧之

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.3 Guo Qingfan 618; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: When he had finished speaking,

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.3 Guo Qingfan 618; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: using it for a pillow, lay down to sleep.

sense.def: nodd off; rest (as on a table before one), take a nap; doze off 醉而臥; often: take a nap during the day

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.3 Guo Qingfan 618; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: "You chatter like a rhetorician

sense.def: chattering, chatter; holding forth

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.5 Guo Qingfan 619; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: The skull said,

sense.def: ZHUANG: skull [note the assonance in this name: repetition of "oo"]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.5 Guo Qingfan 619; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: A king facing south on his throne

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.6 Guo Qingfan 619; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: make you some bones and flesh,

sense.def: skin tissue (versus the surface of the skin itself)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 反子父母妻子閭里知識，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.6 Guo Qingfan 619; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: return you to your parents and family and your old home and friends,

sense.def: acquaintances (GUAN)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.7 Guo Qingfan 619; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: The skull frowned severely, wrinkling up its brow.

sense.def: German: (die Nase) rympfen

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.4.7 Guo Qingfan 619; Wang Shumin 649; Fang Yong 471; Chen Guying 454

tls:text.tls:line: "Why would I throw away more happiness than that of a king on a throne

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.2 Guo Qingfan 620; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: short well ropes won't dip up deep water.'

sense.def: draw water from

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.4 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: "Haven't you heard this story?

sense.def: marker of rhetorical questions inviting or suggesting/presupposing a negative answer, derived from the meaning "as the only person"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.4 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: "Haven't you heard this story?

sense.def: question particle

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.4 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Lu escorted it to the ancestral temple,

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.4 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: refusing to eat a single slice of meat

sense.def: HUAINAN, shuolin: large chunk of meat or fish

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.4 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: or drink a cup of wine,

sense.def: beaker on a high foot; mostly: flat plain bowl with ears used for broth or for wine etc

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.4 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: or drink a cup of wine,

sense.def: cups of the contextually determinate substance N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.5.7 Guo Qingfan 621; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 473; Chen Guying 456

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the former sages never required the same ability from all creatures

sense.def: the former sages

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.6.1 Guo Qingfan 623; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 476; Chen Guying 459

tls:text.tls:line: "Only you and I know that you have never died

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.6.1 Guo Qingfan 623; Wang Shumin 652; Fang Yong 476; Chen Guying 459

tls:text.tls:line: Am I really enjoying myself?"

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.7.1 Guo Qingfan 624; Wang Shumin 657; Fang Yong 476; Chen Guying 460

tls:text.tls:line: The seeds of things have mysterious workings.

sense.def: seeds

tls:text.tls:srcline: 得水土之際則為鼃蠙之衣，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.7.1 Guo Qingfan 624; Wang Shumin 657; Fang Yong 476; Chen Guying 460

tls:text.tls:line: on the edges of the water they become Frog's Robe.

sense.def: outer edge, outer limit, extremity, border-line, limits (often between abstract things like periods of time)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.7.1 Guo Qingfan 624; Wang Shumin 657; Fang Yong 476; Chen Guying 460

tls:text.tls:line: Before long the butterflies are transformed and turn into insects

sense.def: butterfly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 18.7.3 Guo Qingfan 625; Wang Shumin 657; Fang Yong 476; Chen Guying 460

tls:text.tls:line: Men in time return again to the mysterious workings.

sense.def: causal mechanism; crucial mechanism; underlying mechanism

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.1.2 Guo Qingfan 630; Wang Shumin 667; Fang Yong 485; Chen Guying 465

tls:text.tls:line: He who has life must first of all see to it that it does not leave the body.

sense.def: physical body as opposed to the Self which has this body (without being identical with it)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.1.3 Guo Qingfan 630; Wang Shumin 667; Fang Yong 485; Chen Guying 465

tls:text.tls:line: then why is what the world does worth doing?

sense.def: what object? i.e. none

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.1.5 Guo Qingfan 632; Wang Shumin 667; Fang Yong 485; Chen Guying 465

tls:text.tls:line: But why is abandoning the affairs of the world worth while, and why is forgetting life worth while?

sense.def: why?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.1.6 Guo Qingfan 632; Wang Shumin 667; Fang Yong 485; Chen Guying 465

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and earth are the father and mother of the ten thousand things.

sense.def: Heaven and Earth as metaphysical entities

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.1.6 Guo Qingfan 632; Wang Shumin 667; Fang Yong 485; Chen Guying 465

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and earth are the father and mother of the ten thousand things.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.1 Guo Qingfan 633; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 467

tls:text.tls:line: can tread on fire without being burned,

sense.def: treat on

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.2 Guo Qingfan 634; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: Sit down

sense.def: sit down and don't go away!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.2 Guo Qingfan 634; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: and I will tell you about it.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡有貌象聲色者，皆物也，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.2 Guo Qingfan 634; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: All that have faces, forms, voices, colors - these are all mere things.

sense.def: concrete thing; things; external things; kind of thing (Note incidentally that according to AC Graham this should probably be taken as a mass noun, so that 萬物 should literally become "myriad kinds of things"! 劉徽 on 九章算術 8.1: èr wù 二物 NOT: two items, but: two kinds of items, as in 二物者再程 "in the case of two kinds of items one measures twice". 物數 "number of kinds of things".)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.2 Guo Qingfan 634; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: They are forms, colors - nothing more.

sense.def: Zhuangzi, but later mostly BUDDH: form, matter, physical objects (the object which is perceived); SANSKRIT rūpa

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.3 Guo Qingfan 634; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: But things have their creation in what has no form,

sense.def: be created from/by

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.3 Guo Qingfan 634; Wang Shumin 670; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: unify his nature,

sense.def: concentrate 壹志 "concentrate the mind"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.5 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: "When a drunken man falls from a carriage,

sense.def: be drunk 甚醉

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.5 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: "When a drunken man falls from a carriage,

sense.def: fall from

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.5 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: though the carriage may be going very fast, he won't be killed.

sense.def: move quickly; move with urgency; be fast enough

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.5 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 487; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: He has bones and joints the same as other men,

sense.def: joints in the body 百節,三百六十節

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.6 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: If he can keep himself whole like this by means of wine,

sense.def: even also; even (猶。。。何況)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.7 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: "A man seeking revenge does not go so far as to smash the sword of his enemy;

sense.def: seek revenge; take revenge

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.7 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: "A man seeking revenge does not go so far as to smash the sword of his enemy;

sense.def: unfriendly act

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.7 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: "A man seeking revenge does not go so far as to smash the sword of his enemy;

sense.def: break off; take off (an ear); have (one's ribs etc) broken

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.7 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: a man, no matter how hot-tempered, does not rail at the tile that happens to fall on him.

sense.def: burnt clay; earthenware; tile

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.7 Guo Qingfan 636; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: To know that all things in the world are equal and the same-t

sense.def: be on a par; be equal; be equable

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.2.8 Guo Qingfan 638; Wang Shumin 674; Fang Yong 488; Chen Guying 468

tls:text.tls:line: and the people will be close to the attainment of Truth." 1

tls:text.tls:line: you haven't been struck down midway by blindness or deafness, lameness or deformity -

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.3 Guo Qingfan 663; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 494

tls:text.tls:line: you haven't been struck down midway by blindness or deafness, lameness or deformity -

sense.def: lameness

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.3 Guo Qingfan 663; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 494

tls:text.tls:line: you haven't been struck down midway by blindness or deafness, lameness or deformity -

sense.def: lameness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.4 Guo Qingfan 665; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 494

tls:text.tls:line: and then looked up to heaven and sighed.

sense.def: throw one's head back and V; throw one's head back and look at the sky

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.4 Guo Qingfan 665; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 494

tls:text.tls:line: One of his disciples asked,

sense.def: an (identifiabe) disciple, the disciple

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.4 Guo Qingfan 665; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 494

tls:text.tls:line: "Why does my teacher sigh?"

sense.def: you, master

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.6 Guo Qingfan 665; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 495

tls:text.tls:line: "Surely not," said the disciple.

sense.def: an (identifiabe) disciple, the disciple

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.7 Guo Qingfan 665; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 495

tls:text.tls:line: had a T'ai-lao sacrifice prepared for it to feast on,

sense.def: make (large-scale) offerings of wine (to the gods in order to seek their blessings)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 19.13.8 Guo Qingfan 666; Wang Shumin 714; Fang Yong 511; Chen Guying 495

tls:text.tls:line: is like taking a mouse for a ride in a carriage

sense.def: house mouse, domestic mouse

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.2 Guo Qingfan 667; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: Down from the mountain,

sense.def: leave (a place) 出於

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.2 Guo Qingfan 667; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: the Master stopped for a night at the house of an old friend.

sense.def: take temporary lodging (with somebody or in a certain place); (of army) encamp at

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.2 Guo Qingfan 667; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: the Master stopped for a night at the house of an old friend.

sense.def: old friend> friend

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.2 Guo Qingfan 667; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: ordered his son to kill a goose and prepare it.

sense.def: boy 五尺之豎子; 二豎子 miserable little boy; little wretch; servant boy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.3 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: Chuang Tzu's disciples questioned him.

sense.def: an (identifiabe) disciple, the disciple

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.3 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: "Yesterday there was a tree on the mountain

sense.def: immediately preceding (day)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.4 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: Chuang Tzu laughed and said,

sense.def: with a smile (amicably)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.5 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: drifting and wandering with the ancestor of the ten thousand things,

sense.def: ZUO Zhao 22: original first ancestor of the clan; the highest ancestor (BUDDH: patriarch (the founder or transmitter of a Buddhist lineage))

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.5 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: treating things as things but not letting them treat you as a thing -

sense.def: be treated as thing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.5 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: treating things as things but not letting them treat you as a thing -

sense.def: concrete thing; things; external things; kind of thing (Note incidentally that according to AC Graham this should probably be taken as a mass noun, so that 萬物 should literally become "myriad kinds of things"! 劉徽 on 九章算術 8.1: èr wù 二物 NOT: two items, but: two kinds of items, as in 二物者再程 "in the case of two kinds of items one measures twice". 物數 "number of kinds of things".)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.5 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: treating things as things but not letting them treat you as a thing -

sense.def: treat as a thing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.5 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: then how could you get into any trouble?

sense.def: How can one V?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.6 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: and the codes of ethics handed down from man to man, matters don't proceed in this fashion.

sense.def: principles underlying human relations and moral behaviour; proper human relations; standards of proper human conduct

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.6 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: If sharp-edged, they are blunted;

sense.def: be blunted

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.7 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: What is there, then, that can be counted on?

sense.def: How can one V?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.7 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: remember this, my students -

sense.def: you, my disciples

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.1.7 Guo Qingfan 668; Wang Shumin 719; Fang Yong 519; Chen Guying 498

tls:text.tls:line: remember this, my students -

sense.def: remember!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.1 Guo Qingfan 670; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: I-liao from south of the Market called upon the marquis of Lu.2

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.1 Guo Qingfan 670; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis had a very worried look on his face.

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.1 Guo Qingfan 670; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis had a very worried look on his face.

sense.def: worried, troubled

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.2 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Lu said,

sense.def: Marquis of N 齊侯

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.2 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: and never for an instant leave their side.

sense.def: for a very short time, for as much as a moment; occasionally used nominally: a moment of life; after a very short time, in no time

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.3 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: The sleek-furred fox and the elegantly spotted leopard

sense.def: fox

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.3 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: The sleek-furred fox and the elegantly spotted leopard

sense.def: leopard

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.3 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 501

tls:text.tls:line: and crouch in the cliffside caves -

sense.def: in caves; in a cave

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然且不免於罔羅機辟之患。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.4 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: And yet they can't seem to escape the disaster of nets and traps.

sense.def: mechanical

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.4 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: So I would ask you to strip away your form, rid yourself of this fur,

sense.def: hide, skin or hide which originally had hair on it or was furry; whole skin of an animal

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.5 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: few in thoughts of self, scant in desires.

sense.def: on a small scale; a little; a little distance; for a short while

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.6 Guo Qingfan 671; Wang Shumin 726; Fang Yong 522; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: and, with the Way as your helper, journey there."

sense.def: the object(s), this, him; them; the other

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.7 Guo Qingfan 674; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: "The road there is long and perilous.

sense.def: way in the sense of distance covered, or stretch to be covered; route

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.7 Guo Qingfan 674; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: "The road there is long and perilous.

sense.def: be dangerous

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.7 Guo Qingfan 674; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, there are rivers and mountains between

sense.def: also the predicate; also the object; in addition; moreover; to make things worse

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.8 Guo Qingfan 674; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: "Be without imperiousness,

sense.def: be arrogantly nonchalant in behaviour, be impolitely informal

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.11 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: and an empty boat happens along and bumps into him,

sense.def: boat, ship

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: If his first shout is unheeded,

sense.def: one time; for the first time; once (a day)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: If his first shout is unheeded,

sense.def: call out, shout

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: he will shout again,

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: and if that is not heard, he will shout a third time,

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: and if that is not heard, he will shout a third time,

sense.def: for a third time

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: this time with a torrent of curses following.

sense.def: way of speaking; facon de parler DC: 3.指言語。《孟子·公孫丑上》："無嚴諸侯，惡聲至，必反之。" 焦循 正義："惡聲，猶惡言也。"《史記·樂毅列傳》："臣聞古之君子，交絕不出惡聲。" 清 陳澧 《東塾讀書記·小學》："意者象乎事物而構之者也，聲者象乎意而宣之者也。"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: If a man could succeed in making himself empty, and in that way wander through the world,

sense.def: make (oneself) empty 虛己

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.2.12 Guo Qingfan 675; Wang Shumin 730; Fang Yong 523; Chen Guying 502

tls:text.tls:line: then who could do him harm?"

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.3.2 Guo Qingfan 676; Wang Shumin 733; Fang Yong 528; Chen Guying 506

tls:text.tls:line: asked,

sense.def: go on to say (i.e. ask); say (in the form of a question) in the process of a conversation

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.3.3 Guo Qingfan 676; Wang Shumin 734; Fang Yong 528; Chen Guying 506

tls:text.tls:line: Dull, I am without understanding;

sense.def: intelligent perception or awareness of things

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.3.4 Guo Qingfan 676; Wang Shumin 734; Fang Yong 528; Chen Guying 506

tls:text.tls:line: So I can collect taxes from morning to night and meet not the slightest rebuff.

sense.def: at short intervals, all the time; day and night

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.2 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 530; Chen Guying 508

tls:text.tls:line: T'ai-kung Jen went to offer his sympathy.

sense.def: offer condolences to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.2 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 530; Chen Guying 508

tls:text.tls:line: "It looks as if you're going to die," he said.

sense.def: nearly, almost

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.4 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: "Then let me try telling you about a way to keep from dying.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.4 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: pushed and shoved before it can get back to its nest.

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.4 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: pushed and shoved before it can get back to its nest.

sense.def: be threatened; be put under pressure

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.6 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: work at your good conduct in order to distinguish yourself from the disreputable,

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.6 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: work at your good conduct in order to distinguish yourself from the disreputable,

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.6 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: going around bright and shining as though you were carrying the sun and moon in your hand!

sense.def: be resplendent

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.6 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: going around bright and shining as though you were carrying the sun and moon in your hand!

sense.def: understand clearly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.7 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: fame once won faces ruin.'

sense.def: get weakened

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.7 Guo Qingfan 680; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: Who can rid himself of success and fame,

sense.def: whoever? i.e. no one

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.9 Guo Qingfan 6i3; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: dismissed his disciples,

sense.def: the disciples

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.9 Guo Qingfan 6i3; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: and retired to the great swamp,

sense.def: flee into

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.9 Guo Qingfan 6i3; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: and living on acorns and chestnuts.

sense.def: ERYA: acorn [not to be confused with zhù 杼"shuttle".]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.4.9 Guo Qingfan 6i3; Wang Shumin 737; Fang Yong 531; Chen Guying 509

tls:text.tls:line: and living on acorns and chestnuts.

sense.def: fruit of the chestnut tree; chestnut

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.1 Guo Qingfan 6i4; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: "Twice I have been driven out of Lu.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.1 Guo Qingfan 6i4; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: "Twice I have been driven out of Lu.

sense.def: get chased away, get ousted

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.2 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: "Have you never heard about Lin Hui,

sense.def: marker of rhetorical questions inviting or suggesting/presupposing a negative answer, derived from the meaning "as the only person"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.2 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: strapped his little baby on his back, and hurried off. S

sense.def: little baby

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.2 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: Why then throw away a jade disc worth a thousand measures of gold

sense.def: abandon; set aside; discard (as no longe of use), throw away (useless things); refuse to accept

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.2 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: Why then throw away a jade disc worth a thousand measures of gold

sense.def: circular piece of jade, (which could also be of stone), with a hole in the middle, the diameter of the hole being as large as the breadth of the ring around it. One of the liù yù 六玉 used in sacrifices to Heaven and Earth and the Four Directions, as well as in various formal court ceremonials.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.2 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: and hurry off with a little baby on your back?'

sense.def: carry on one's back; transferred: take upon oneself (official duties etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.2 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: and hurry off with a little baby on your back?'

sense.def: little baby

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.3 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: when pressed by misfortune and danger, will cling to one another.

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.4 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: "The friendship of a gentleman, they say, is insipid as water;

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.4 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: that of a petty man, sweet as rich wine.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.4 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: But the insipidity of the gentleman leads to affection,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.4 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: while the sweetness of the petty man leads to revulsion.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.4 Guo Qingfan 685; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: while the sweetness of the petty man leads to revulsion.

sense.def: but; but in spite of this

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.5 Guo Qingfan 686; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: Then, with leisurely steps and a free and easy manner, he returned home.

sense.def: slowly, softly, gently; with slow emphasis; at one's own pace, gradually

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.5 Guo Qingfan 686; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: and his disciples no longer came to bow in obeisance before him,

sense.def: the disciples

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.5.6 Guo Qingfan 686; Wang Shumin 743; Fang Yong 534; Chen Guying 512

tls:text.tls:line: tied his shoes with hemp to keep them from falling apart,

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.6.3 Guo Qingfan 688; Wang Shumin 748; Fang Yong 537; Chen Guying 515

tls:text.tls:line: Has Your Majesty never observed the bounding monkeys?

sense.def: marker of rhetorical questions inviting or suggesting/presupposing a negative answer, derived from the meaning "as the only person"

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.6.3 Guo Qingfan 688; Wang Shumin 748; Fang Yong 537; Chen Guying 515

tls:text.tls:line: Has Your Majesty never observed the bounding monkeys?

sense.def: perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.6.3 Guo Qingfan 688; Wang Shumin 748; Fang Yong 537; Chen Guying 515

tls:text.tls:line: Has Your Majesty never observed the bounding monkeys?

sense.def: monkey

tls:text.tls:line: they will swing and sway from their limbs, frolic and lord it in their midst,

sense.def: grasp, take; pluck; stir

tls:text.tls:srcline: 及其得柘棘枳枸之閒也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 及其得柘棘枳枸之閒也，

sense.def: shake. rock, tremble

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 20.7.4 Guo Qingfan 691; Wang Shumin 752; Fang Yong 539; Chen Guying 518

tls:text.tls:line: A gentleman will not pilfer,

tls:text.tls:line: taken leave of men, and were standing in solitude itself!"

sense.def: detach oneself from; distance oneself from, become separated from; deviate from; be apart from; leave the realm of so as to transcend; transcend; become detached from

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: In this world,

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 21.4.11 Guo Qingfan 714; Wang Shumin 7i2; Fang Yong 563; Chen Guying 539

tls:text.tls:line: life and death, beginning and end will be mere day and night,

tls:text.tls:line: for he knows that his own person is of more worth than the servants who tend it.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 21.4.12 Guo Qingfan 714; Wang Shumin 7i2; Fang Yong 563; Chen Guying 539

tls:text.tls:line: And since the ten thousand transformations continue

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 21.4.12 Guo Qingfan 714; Wang Shumin 7i2; Fang Yong 563; Chen Guying 539

tls:text.tls:line: are the frills of the Way and the forerunners of disorder.3

sense.def: beginning; fig: source

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.9 Guo Qingfan 731; Wang Shumin 805; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 558

tls:text.tls:line: He who practices the Way does less every day,

sense.def: suffer loss, be reduced, get reduced

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.10 Guo Qingfan 733; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 558

tls:text.tls:line: if it scatters, there is death.

sense.def: scatter in all directions; be disunited

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.10 Guo Qingfan 733; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 558

tls:text.tls:line: then what is there for us to be anxious about?

sense.def: why go on to? (expected answer: there is no reason to go on to...)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.11 Guo Qingfan 733; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 559

tls:text.tls:line: But the foul and rotten may turn into the rare and unearthly,

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.13 Guo Qingfan 734; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 559

tls:text.tls:line: Now I have asked you and you know the answer.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.14 Guo Qingfan 734; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 559

tls:text.tls:line: "Do-Nothing-Say-Nothing is the one who is truly right -

sense.def: (is) truly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.1.14 Guo Qingfan 734; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 559

tls:text.tls:line: But you and I in the end are nowhere near it -

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.2.1 Guo Qingfan 735; Wang Shumin i11; Fang Yong 590; Chen Guying 563

tls:text.tls:line: The sage seeks out the beauties of Heaven and earth

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.2.2 Guo Qingfan 735; Wang Shumin i11; Fang Yong 590; Chen Guying 563

tls:text.tls:line: This Way, whose spiritual brightness is of the greatest purity,

sense.def: supernatural intelligence; supernatural or cosmic virtues

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.2.2 Guo Qingfan 735; Wang Shumin i11; Fang Yong 590; Chen Guying 563

tls:text.tls:line: just as they have been since ancient times.

sense.def: count as especially V; be regarded as typically V

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.2.2 Guo Qingfan 735; Wang Shumin i11; Fang Yong 590; Chen Guying 563

tls:text.tls:line: just as they have been since ancient times.

sense.def: be huge

tls:text.tls:line: things as tiny as an autumn hair

sense.def: hair

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.2.2 Guo Qingfan 735; Wang Shumin i11; Fang Yong 590; Chen Guying 563

tls:text.tls:line: things as tiny as an autumn hair

sense.def: count as especially V; be regarded as typically V

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.3.1 Guo Qingfan 737; Wang Shumin i13; Fang Yong 593; Chen Guying 566

sense.def: recently (deceased/built etc)

tls:text.tls:line: Nieh Ch'ueh fell sound asleep.

sense.def: doze off so as to fall asleep

tls:text.tls:line: Nieh Ch'ueh fell sound asleep.

sense.def: be deep asleep

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: Nieh Ch'ueh fell sound asleep.

sense.def: fall asleep; get to sleep

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.3.2 Guo Qingfan 738; Wang Shumin i13; Fang Yong 593; Chen Guying 566

tls:text.tls:line: Body like a withered corpse,

sense.def: withered, dried (of wood, earth, fish, skull)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.3.2 Guo Qingfan 738; Wang Shumin i13; Fang Yong 593; Chen Guying 566

tls:text.tls:line: Body like a withered corpse,

sense.def: human bones in the living body or as part of a skeleton

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.3.2 Guo Qingfan 738; Wang Shumin i13; Fang Yong 593; Chen Guying 566

tls:text.tls:line: true in the realness of knowledge,

sense.def: make true and genuine, make true to oneself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.1 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i13; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: Shun asked Ch'eng,

sense.def: 問於N曰 ZHUANG 問乎N曰

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.1 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i13; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: Shun asked Ch'eng,

sense.def: assistant official

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.2 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i16; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: "You don't even have possession of your own body -

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.2 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i16; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: how could you possibly gain possession of the Way!"

sense.def: how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.3 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i16; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

sense.def: go on to say (i.e. ask); say (in the form of a question) in the process of a conversation

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.3 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i16; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: "If I don't have possession of my own body, t

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.5 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i16; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: So it is best to walk without knowing where you are going,

sense.def: OBI: set out for; be on one's way; go along to; go to GUAN: 往之, 所往

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.4.5 Guo Qingfan 739; Wang Shumin i16; Fang Yong 595; Chen Guying 567

tls:text.tls:line: How then could it be possible to gain possession of anything?"

sense.def: How can one V?

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.2 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: wash and purify your inner spirit,

sense.def: purify

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.2 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: wash and purify your inner spirit,

sense.def: derived sense: wash away (guilt)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.2 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: wash and purify your inner spirit,

sense.def: your

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.2 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

sense.def: subtle spirit; subtle spirits [occasionally: essential sprits; vital forces][CA]; soul as seat of thought

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.2 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: is abstruse and difficult to describe.

sense.def: deep; profound

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.3 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: "The bright and shining is born out of deep darkness;

sense.def: brightness; luminosity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.3 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: "The bright and shining is born out of deep darkness;

sense.def: radiance; brightness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.3 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: pure spirit is born out of the Way.

sense.def: subtle spirit; subtle spirits [occasionally: essential sprits; vital forces][CA]; soul as seat of thought

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.3 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore those with nine openings in the body are born from the womb;

sense.def: (born) from the womb

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.3 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

sense.def: (born) from an egg 卵生

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.4 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

tls:text.tls:line: responding to things without prejudice.

sense.def: one-sided subjective method> prejudice?? ???

sense.def: will certainly; willy nilly have to; inevitably will; certainly would have

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.5 Guo Qingfan 741; Wang Shumin i18; Fang Yong 596; Chen Guying 569

sense.def: will certainly; willy nilly have to; inevitably will; certainly would have

sense.def: diminish, subtract from;

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

sense.def: a short moment

tls:text.tls:line: How, then, is it worth deciding that Yao is good and Chieh is bad?

sense.def: how? in what way

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.10 Guo Qingfan 744; Wang Shumin i22; Fang Yong 597; Chen Guying 569

sense.def: principles underlying human relations and moral behaviour; proper human relations; standards of proper human conduct

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.11 Guo Qingfan 746; Wang Shumin i23; Fang Yong 597; Chen Guying 570

tls:text.tls:line: "Man's life between heaven and earth

sense.def: the space between

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.11 Guo Qingfan 746; Wang Shumin i23; Fang Yong 597; Chen Guying 570

tls:text.tls:line: is like the passing of a white colt glimpsed through a crack in the wall-

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.5.11 Guo Qingfan 746; Wang Shumin i23; Fang Yong 597; Chen Guying 570

tls:text.tls:line: the body following after,

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.6.7 Guo Qingfan 750; Wang Shumin i28; Fang Yong 603; Chen Guying 574

sense.def: ever more; SHI: increasingly; more and more; all the more, even more; ZZ: the more... the more

tls:text.tls:line: "He who, when asked about the Way, gives an answer

sense.def: respond immediately (in speech) to 應之; respond intellectually (to something challenging that has been said)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.8.11 Guo Qingfan 758; Wang Shumin i37; Fang Yong 609; Chen Guying 5i1

tls:text.tls:line: does not understand the Way;

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.9.1 Guo Qingfan 759; Wang Shumin i39; Fang Yong 610; Chen Guying 5i2

tls:text.tls:line: Bright Dazzlement asked Non-Existence,

sense.def: 問於N曰 ZHUANG 問乎N曰

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.9.1 Guo Qingfan 759; Wang Shumin i39; Fang Yong 610; Chen Guying 5i2

tls:text.tls:line: or do you not exist?"

sense.def: or shall we, or should we?; or perhaps; either... or;Note OBI: 其 V 其弗 V: whether we V or not ZGC: 其不乎？ "or not?"

tls:text.tls:srcline:
無有弗應也，
光曜不得問，而孰視其狀貌，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.9.2 Guo Qingfan 759; Wang Shumin i39; Fang Yong 610; Chen Guying 5i2

tls:text.tls:line: Unable to obtain any answer, Bright Dazzlement stared intently at the other's face and form -

sense.def: every aspect of the appearance, the shape and form

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.9.3 Guo Qingfan 760; Wang Shumin i39; Fang Yong 611; Chen Guying 5i2

tls:text.tls:line: "Who can reach such perfection?

sense.def: who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.9.3 Guo Qingfan 760; Wang Shumin i39; Fang Yong 611; Chen Guying 5i2

tls:text.tls:line: I can conceive of the existence of nonexistence,

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.11.3 Guo Qingfan 762; Wang Shumin i43; Fang Yong 613; Chen Guying 585

tls:text.tls:line: Yesterday that seemed quite clear to me,

sense.def: last

tls:text.tls:line: is modeled on this principle."

sense.def: this (particular abstract thing)

sense.def: 問於N曰 ZHUANG 問乎N曰

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.12.2 Guo Qingfan 765; Wang Shumin i47; Fang Yong 615; Chen Guying 588

tls:text.tls:line: He who changes along with things

sense.def: be transformed, be completely changed

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 22.12.5 Guo Qingfan 765; Wang Shumin i47; Fang Yong 615; Chen Guying 588

tls:text.tls:line: the men of this world are no more than travelers, stopping now at this inn, now at that, all of them run by `things.'

sense.def: literary: unofficial hotel for use by the general public

tls:text.tls:line: can you help but pity them?

sense.def: be sad in quality; be sad to look at/think about; be pathetic

sense.def: you, my disciples

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.7.2Guo Qingfan 802; Wang Shumin 894; Fang Yong 643; Chen Guying 613

tls:text.tls:line: on death as the rump.

sense.def: buttocks, rump, end of spine

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.7.3Guo Qingfan 802; Wang Shumin 894; Fang Yong 643; Chen Guying 613

tls:text.tls:line: These three groups, while differing in their viewpoint,

sense.def: 是三者

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.7.5 Guo Qingfan 805; Wang Shumin 901; Fang Yong 643; Chen Guying 613

tls:text.tls:line: At the winter sacrifice, you can point to the tripe or the hoof of the sacrificial ox,

sense.def: ZHUANG: tripe; ox's stomach

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.7.5 Guo Qingfan 805; Wang Shumin 901; Fang Yong 643; Chen Guying 613

tls:text.tls:line: At the winter sacrifice, you can point to the tripe or the hoof of the sacrificial ox,

sense.def: ZHUANG: big toe

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.7.6 Guo Qingfan 807; Wang Shumin 901; Fang Yong 643; Chen Guying 613

tls:text.tls:line: and accordingly each man considers himself to be their arbiter.

sense.def: using (oneself)> with one's own things, by one's own standards

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.7.7 Guo Qingfan 807; Wang Shumin 901; Fang Yong 643; Chen Guying 613

tls:text.tls:line: he who runs into trouble is heaped with shame.

sense.def: failure

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.8.1 Guo Qingfan 808; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 646; Chen Guying 617

tls:text.tls:line: you apologize at length for your carelessness.

sense.def: explain oneself and apologise; make self-effacing speeches; plead

tls:text.tls:srcline:
容、動、
色、理、氣、意六者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.1 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: Appearances and carriage, complexion and features, temperament and attitude - these six

sense.def: characteristic appearance; physiognomy (also of things generally) bodily comportment, physical expression; especially as expressive of inner mood or personality

tls:text.tls:srcline:
容、動、
色、理、氣、意六者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.1 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: Appearances and carriage, complexion and features, temperament and attitude - these six

sense.def: movement

tls:text.tls:srcline:
惡、欲、
喜、怒、哀、樂六者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.1 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: Loathing and desire, joy and anger, grief and happiness - these six

sense.def: happy overt joy (typically with regard to something)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
惡、欲、
喜、怒、哀、樂六者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.1 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: Loathing and desire, joy and anger, grief and happiness - these six

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.3 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: The Way is virtue's idol.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.3 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: Life is virtue's light.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.3 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: Life is virtue's light.

sense.def: light; brightness; glint

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.9.3 Guo Qingfan i10; Wang Shumin 905; Fang Yong 647; Chen Guying 618

tls:text.tls:line: The inborn nature is the substance of life.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: but clumsy in not preventing people from praising him for it.

sense.def: be inept at, be clumsy about (sometimes with 於，乎)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: The sage is skilled in what pertains to Heaven

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed mpredicate)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: The sage is skilled in what pertains to Heaven

sense.def: have worked a lot with and be specialised in, be good at working on; be qualified for

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: and good at human ones as well -

sense.def: be adroit at

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: only the Complete Man can encompass that.

sense.def: completely well-developed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: only the Complete Man can encompass that.

sense.def: show a capacity for

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.10.1 Guo Qingfan i13; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 649; Chen Guying 619

tls:text.tls:line: because only bugs can abide by Heaven.

sense.def: be Heaven-like in one's all-encompassing attitude; act like Heaven

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.11.1 Guo Qingfan i14; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 650; Chen Guying 621

tls:text.tls:line: and then the sparrows would have had no place to flee to.

sense.def: escape into, escape to (a place, or a person who protects one)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 秦穆公以五羊之皮籠百里奚。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.11.1 Guo Qingfan i14; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 650; Chen Guying 621

tls:text.tls:line: and Duke Mu caged Po-li Hsi for the price of five ram skins.25

sense.def: hide, skin or hide which originally had hair on it or was furry; whole skin of an animal

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故非以其所好籠之而可得者，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.11.1 Guo Qingfan i14; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 650; Chen Guying 621

tls:text.tls:line: But if you hope to get a man, you must cage him with what he likes or

sense.def: put in a cage> keep trapped

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.12.2 Guo Qingfan i15; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 651; Chen Guying 621

tls:text.tls:line: He who wishes to be still must calm his energies;

sense.def: strongly felt acute feelings

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 23.12.2 Guo Qingfan i15; Wang Shumin 911; Fang Yong 651; Chen Guying 621

tls:text.tls:line: He who wishes to be still must calm his energies;

sense.def: inner mental energies of a person; vital energies in a person

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.4 Guo Qingfan i19; Wang Shumin 917; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 625

tls:text.tls:line: When I judge a horse,

sense.def: assess professionally by physiognomy applied to all parts of the body

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: A man who has fled into the wilderness,

sense.def: escape into, escape to (a place, or a person who protects one)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: A man who has fled into the wilderness,

sense.def: wilderness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: and has lived there in emptiness and isolation for a long time,

sense.def: emptiness 養空 "cultivate emptiness"BUDDH: emptiness, voidness (the notion of emptiness developed into one of the key terms of Mahāyāna Buddhism; for explanations in secondary literature see 'sources'); SANSKRIT śūnyatā

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: will be delighted if he hears so much as the rustle of a human footfall.

sense.def: make a sound (of feet)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 有況乎昆弟親戚之謦欬其側者乎！

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: And how much more so if he hears his own brothers and kin chattering and laughing at his side!

sense.def: brothers

tls:text.tls:srcline: 有況乎昆弟親戚之謦欬其側者乎！

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: And how much more so if he hears his own brothers and kin chattering and laughing at his side!

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:text.tls:srcline: 久矣夫莫以真人之言謦欬吾君之側乎！」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.1.11 Guo Qingfan i22; Wang Shumin 921; Fang Yong 657; Chen Guying 626

tls:text.tls:line: It has been a long time, I think, since one who speaks like a True Man has sat chattering and laughing at our ruler's side."

sense.def: the true man; the man who is true to himself; the man who has realised himself; a person who has truly realised his potential

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.2.1 Guo Qingfan i24; Wang Shumin 926; Fang Yong 661; Chen Guying 630

tls:text.tls:line: eating acorns and chestnuts,

sense.def: acorn

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.2.9 Guo Qingfan i27; Wang Shumin 926; Fang Yong 661; Chen Guying 630

tls:text.tls:line: is to sow the seeds for more weapon-wielding!

sense.def: produce (fruit etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.2.10 Guo Qingfan i27; Wang Shumin 926; Fang Yong 661; Chen Guying 630

tls:text.tls:line: Where a model exists, copies will be made of it;

sense.def: produce (fruit etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.2 Guo Qingfan i31; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: Just then they happened upon a young boy herding horses,

sense.def: as it turned out in the event; by some coincidence 士適出 "this officer happened to leave the house".

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.2 Guo Qingfan i31; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: Just then they happened upon a young boy herding horses,

sense.def: meet by coincidence; sometimes generally: get to meet, have the opportunity to meet (someone who is hard to meet, or whom it is a good fortune to get to meet); run into, be exposed to (situations)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.2 Guo Qingfan i31; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: Just then they happened upon a young boy herding horses,

sense.def: tend cattle; to herd

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.2 Guo Qingfan i31; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: Just then they happened upon a young boy herding horses,

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.2 Guo Qingfan i31; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: and asked him for directions.

sense.def: major one-track mud-road suitable for carts; road

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.4 Guo Qingfan i32; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: "You not only know the way to Chu-tz'u Mountain,

sense.def: adolescent, youth from the age fifteen to about the age of twenty 十五成童

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.4 Guo Qingfan i32; Wang Shumin 931; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

sense.def: take charge of; be in charge of, run (a state; a government)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予少而自遊於六合之內，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.5 Guo Qingfan i32; Wang Shumin 932; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: When I was little, I used to go wandering within the Six Realms,

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.5 Guo Qingfan i32; Wang Shumin 932; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: but in time I contracted a disease that blurred my eyesight.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:text.tls:srcline: 予又且復遊於六合之外。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.6 Guo Qingfan i32; Wang Shumin 932; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: Soon I can go wandering once more, this time beyond the Six Realms.

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.3.6 Guo Qingfan i32; Wang Shumin 932; Fang Yong 664; Chen Guying 633

tls:text.tls:line: I don't see why it has to be anything special."

sense.def: I (personally); I personally; I, as a matter of personal experience or sensibility 予欲 "I wish..."

tls:text.tls:srcline: 知士无思慮之變則不樂，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.1 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: The wise man is not happy without the modulations of idea and thought;

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 辯士无談說之序則不樂，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.1 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: the rhetorician is not happy without the progression of argument and rebuttal;

sense.def: conversation, public dialogue

tls:text.tls:srcline: 辯士无談說之序則不樂，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.1 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: the rhetorician is not happy without the progression of argument and rebuttal;

sense.def: detailed explanation; satisfactory explanation; doctrine, thesis; discourse

tls:text.tls:srcline: 察士无淩誶之事則不樂，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.1 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: the examiner is not happy without the tasks of interrogation and intimidation.

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.2 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: men of haggard hermit looks reach out for fame;

sense.def: withered and dissiccated

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.2 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: men of laws and regulations long for broader legislation;

sense.def: laws and regulations

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.2 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: men of ritual and instruction revere appearances;

sense.def: characteristic appearance; physiognomy (also of things generally) bodily comportment, physical expression; especially as expressive of inner mood or personality

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.2 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: men of benevolence and righteousness value human relationships.

sense.def: interaction, relation; social intercourse; "interface!!"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 農夫无草萊之事則不比，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.3 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: The farmer is not content if he does not have his work in the fields and weed patches;

sense.def: the peasants; any peasant

tls:text.tls:srcline: 商賈无巿井之事則不比。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.3 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: the merchant is not content if he does not have his affairs at the market place and wellside.

sense.def: merchants of all kinds 百工商賈

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.3 Guo Qingfan i34; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: the hundred artisans are most vigorous when they are exercising their skills with tools and machines.

sense.def: get to flourish (see also STRONG)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.4 Guo Qingfan i35; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: In this way they all follow along with the turning years,

sense.def: these things

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.4.4 Guo Qingfan i35; Wang Shumin 936; Fang Yong 666; Chen Guying 635

tls:text.tls:line: Pitiful, are they not?

sense.def: isn't that so?, n'est-ce pas!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.5 Guo Qingfan i38; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: His disciple said to him,

sense.def: an (identifiabe) disciple, the disciple

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.5 Guo Qingfan i38; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: I can build a fire under the caldron in winter

sense.def: MENG: apply heat to

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.5 Guo Qingfan i38; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: and make ice in summer.'

sense.def: produce (fruit etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.6 Guo Qingfan i38; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon he tuned two lutes,

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.6 Guo Qingfan i38; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: When he struck the kung note on one lute, the kung on the other lute sounded;

sense.def: knock (bell etc); strike (a note on a drum)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.6 Guo Qingfan i38; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: when he struck the chueh note, the other chueh sounded -

sense.def: knock (bell etc); strike (a note on a drum)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.5.9 Guo Qingfan i40; Wang Shumin 942 ; Fang Yong 669; Chen Guying 638

tls:text.tls:line: but when he acquired any bells or chimes, he wrapped them up carefully to prevent breakage.

sense.def: put someone determinate in fetters; bind something determinate up

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.6.1 Guo Qingfan i43; Wang Shumin 948 ; Fang Yong 672; Chen Guying 641

tls:text.tls:line: Carpenter Shih, whirling his hatchet with a noise like the wind,

sense.def: axe with blade at right angle to the shaft. This is a standard carpenter's and wheelwright's tool. [ill.: SUN 1991: 7-9 - 7-10]

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.6.1 Guo Qingfan i43; Wang Shumin 948 ; Fang Yong 672; Chen Guying 641

tls:text.tls:line: would accept the assignment and proceed to slice,

sense.def: rely on or use the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.6.1 Guo Qingfan i43; Wang Shumin 948 ; Fang Yong 672; Chen Guying 641

tls:text.tls:line: removing every bit of mud without injury to the nose,

sense.def: nose

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.6.1 Guo Qingfan i43; Wang Shumin 948 ; Fang Yong 672; Chen Guying 641

tls:text.tls:line: while the plasterer just stood there completely unperturbed.

sense.def: proper dignified appearance, appropriate form, ritually correct form

tls:text.tls:srcline:
不可諱云，
至於大病，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.7.1 Guo Qingfan i44; Wang Shumin 951 ; Fang Yong 673; Chen Guying 642

tls:text.tls:line: If - can I help but say it? - if your illness should become critical,

sense.def: P [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-b2b50423-7ad4-40cb-815c-59efdaef2f37][padS1.adS2]] /

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.7.1 Guo Qingfan i44; Wang Shumin 951 ; Fang Yong 673; Chen Guying 642

tls:text.tls:line: then to whom could I entrust the affairs of the state?"

sense.def: whom

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.7.4 Guo Qingfan i45; Wang Shumin 951 ; Fang Yong 673; Chen Guying 642

tls:text.tls:line: But he will have nothing to do with those who are not like himself.

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 24.7.4 Guo Qingfan i45; Wang Shumin 951 ; Fang Yong 673; Chen Guying 642

tls:text.tls:line: But he will have nothing to do with those who are not like himself.

sense.def: be like, be along the same lines as

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.9.2 Guo Qingfan 939; Wang Shumin 1076; Fang Yong 749; Chen Guying 720

tls:text.tls:line: But if the chambers are not large and roomy,

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.10.1 Guo Qingfan 942; Wang Shumin 1076; Fang Yong 749; Chen Guying 722
