sense.def: N thus/therefore VERBed.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人之所以駴天下，神人未嘗過而問焉；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.11.1 Guo Qingfan 943; Wang Shumin 10i2; Fang Yong 749; Chen Guying 723

tls:text.tls:line: The Holy Man does not bother to ask what methods the sage uses to reform the world.

sense.def: beat the drum > to alarm; warn; admonish (regarding a pending threat); sound an alarm

tls:text.tls:srcline: 賢人所以駴世，聖人未嘗過而問焉；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.11.2 Guo Qingfan 943; Wang Shumin 10i2; Fang Yong 750; Chen Guying 723

tls:text.tls:line: The sage does not bother to ask what methods the worthy man uses to reform the age.

sense.def: beat the drum > to alarm; warn; admonish (regarding a pending threat); sound an alarm

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君子所以駴國，賢人未嘗過而問焉；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.11.2 Guo Qingfan 943; Wang Shumin 10i2; Fang Yong 750; Chen Guying 723

tls:text.tls:line: The worthy man does not bother to ask what methods the gentleman uses to reform the state.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君子所以駴國，賢人未嘗過而問焉；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.11.2 Guo Qingfan 943; Wang Shumin 10i2; Fang Yong 750; Chen Guying 723

tls:text.tls:line: The worthy man does not bother to ask what methods the gentleman uses to reform the state.

sense.def: people of moral superior character 養君子

tls:text.tls:srcline: 小人所以合時，君子未嘗過而問焉。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 26.11.2 Guo Qingfan 943; Wang Shumin 10i2; Fang Yong 750; Chen Guying 723

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman does not bother to ask what methods the petty man uses to get along with the times.

tls:text.tls:line: I would therefore like to go on your behalf and try to persuade him to change his ways."

sense.def: 子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, Chih is a man

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: reputation; (good or bad) name;

sense.def: great fame, renown; reputation

tls:text.tls:line: "I will bestow a thousand pieces of gold upon any man who can reason with the king and make him give up these sword fights!"

sense.def: if anyone V-s(, then S)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 30.1.2 Guo Qingfan 1016; Wang Shumin 1215; Fang Yong i33; Chen Guying 806

tls:text.tls:line: "I will bestow a thousand pieces of gold upon any man who can reason with the king and make him give up these sword fights!"

sense.def: give (a present N2) to (a recipient N1 of lower status)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 30.1.4 Guo Qingfan 1017; Wang Shumin 1215; Fang Yong i33; Chen Guying 806

sense.def: how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:text.tls:line: and selects what is proper in human relationships.

sense.def: principles underlying human relations and moral behaviour; proper human relations; standards of proper human conduct

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.7 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1229; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: Above, he pays allegiance to the sovereign of the age;

sense.def: do one's devoted loyal best for N (also, by way of exception, to the people! ZUO 2.6)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.7 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1229; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: Above, he pays allegiance to the sovereign of the age;

sense.def: the rulers of our time

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.7 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1229; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: below, he transforms the ordinary people through education,

sense.def: the common (law-abiding) people

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.12 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1230; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: The stranger then laughed and turned to go,

sense.def: smile with contempt

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.12 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1230; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: But I'm afraid he will not escape unharmed.

sense.def: contrastive: oneself; the person him/herself 吾身,寡人之身

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.12 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1230; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: To weary the mind and wear out the body, putting the Truth in peril like this -

sense.def: (is) truly

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.12 Guo Qingfan 1025; Wang Shumin 1230; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: alas,

sense.def: alas

sense.def: make a report, as requested, typically to authorities

tls:text.tls:line: "A moment ago, Sir," said Confucius, "you made a few cryptic remarks and then left.

sense.def: some time ago; just now

孔子曰：
「曩者先生有緒言而去，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.15 Guo Qingfan 1026; Wang Shumin 1230; Fang Yong i41; Chen Guying i16

tls:text.tls:line: "A moment ago, Sir," said Confucius, "you made a few cryptic remarks and then left.

tls:text.tls:line: and be favored with the sound of your august words,

sense.def: hope for unrealistically, engage in wishful thinking; imagine enthusiastically 幸勿見怪-like examples; gamble on

tls:text.tls:line: "Goodness!" exclaimed the stranger.

sense.def: ah! exclamatory particle expressing surprise, sometimes mixed with delight

sense.def: period of hot weather

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: be timely, come in due time (as seasonal rain), come in season; SHI 193: be in season

tls:text.tls:line: till they all but destroy the common people,

sense.def: to be cruel (to somebody); play a cruel trick on

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

sense.def: population; the people in general

sense.def: be deficient, be in short supply 財匱

sense.def: (of human relationships) be (not) in good order

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.23 Guo Qingfan 1027; Wang Shumin 1234; Fang Yong i42; Chen Guying i17

tls:text.tls:line: to select what is proper in human relationships,'

sense.def: principles underlying human relations and moral behaviour; proper human relations; standards of proper human conduct

sense.def: teach and transform, teach successfully; get to change to the better; educate 化民

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.23 Guo Qingfan 1027; Wang Shumin 1234; Fang Yong i42; Chen Guying i17

tls:text.tls:line: is called obsequiousness.

tls:text.tls:line: A gentleman will not befriend the man who possesses them,

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.1.26 Guo Qingfan 1029; Wang Shumin 1234; Fang Yong i42; Chen Guying i17

sense.def: enlightened ruler

sense.def: what is constant; constant principle

sense.def: be greedy; be covetous

tls:text.tls:line: He is unable to pattern himself on Heaven

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.10 Guo Qingfan 1032; Wang Shumin 1240; Fang Yong i43; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: He does not know enough to prize the Truth

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.11 Guo Qingfan 1033; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i43; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: If, Master, you would not consider it a disgrace for one like myself

sense.def: feel personally ashamed; have reason to feel personally ashamed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.11 Guo Qingfan 1033; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i43; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: and to be taught by you in person,

sense.def: in person, himself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.12 Guo Qingfan 1033; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i43; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: only then may you avoid danger to yourself.

sense.def: contrastive: himself; oneself; the person him/herself (also: 身雖無能)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.12 Guo Qingfan 1033; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i43; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: only then may you avoid danger to yourself.

sense.def: (deserved) bad fortune; (deserved) disaster; (deserved) calamity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.12 Guo Qingfan 1033; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i43; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: So saying, he poled away in his boat,

sense.def: boat, ship

tls:text.tls:srcline: 未嘗見夫子遇人如此其威也。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.14 Guo Qingfan 1034; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: Master, but I have never seen you encounter anyone who filled you with such awe.

sense.def: 如此其VERB

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.14 Guo Qingfan 1034; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: and still you maintain a stiff and haughty air.

sense.def: characteristic appearance; physiognomy (also of things generally) bodily comportment, physical expression; especially as expressive of inner mood or personality

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.15 Guo Qingfan 1034; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: But now this old fisherman, pole in hand, presents himself in front of you,

sense.def: old fisherman

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.15 Guo Qingfan 1034; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: and you double up at the waist, as bent as a chiming-stone,4

sense.def: bend

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.15 Guo Qingfan 1034; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: and you double up at the waist, as bent as a chiming-stone,4

sense.def: waist

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.15 Guo Qingfan 1034; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: and you double up at the waist, as bent as a chiming-stone,4

sense.def: bow down to form the shape of a musical stone (as practised in Japan today...)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.17 Guo Qingfan 1035; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: then they will never attain the Truth.

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.17 Guo Qingfan 1035; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: As a result, they will go on forever bringing injury upon themselves.

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.17 Guo Qingfan 1035; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: Alas!

sense.def: (I) regret the contextually determinate situation N> what a pity!

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.17 Guo Qingfan 1035; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: And yet you alone dare to invite such misfortune!

sense.def: usurp (power); take illegitimate sole control of; gain control over (also: over a ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.18 Guo Qingfan 1035; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: "Moreover, the Way

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 31.2.18 Guo Qingfan 1035; Wang Shumin 1246; Fang Yong i44; Chen Guying i24

tls:text.tls:line: As far as the Way is concerned,

sense.def: old fisherman

sense.def: even also; even (猶。。。何況)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.1.7 Guo Qingfan 1037; Wang Shumin 1252; Fang Yong 852; Chen Guying i29

tls:text.tls:line: Body wearied by the burden of such a state,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.1.7 Guo Qingfan 1037; Wang Shumin 1252; Fang Yong 852; Chen Guying i29

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom exhausted in its administration,

sense.def: be used up; get used up;

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.2.1 Guo Qingfan 1042; Wang Shumin 1259; Fang Yong 855; Chen Guying i34

sense.def: quietly chant poetry to oneself (as one goes); sing softly to oneself (as one goes)

tls:text.tls:line: Ten years of this, and Huan committed suicide.

sense.def: kill oneself

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.2.2 Guo Qingfan 1042; Wang Shumin 1259; Fang Yong 856; Chen Guying i34

tls:text.tls:line: "It was I who made it possible for your son to become a Mo-ist.

sense.def: Mohist; adherent of Mozi's school of philosophy

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.2.2 Guo Qingfan 1042; Wang Shumin 1259; Fang Yong 856; Chen Guying i34

sense.def: be me, (personally); was I (personally)

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.2.4 Guo Qingfan 1043; Wang Shumin 1259; Fang Yong 856; Chen Guying i34

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.3.3 Guo Qingfan 1047; Wang Shumin 1263; Fang Yong 858; Chen Guying i37

sense.def: be confused by

tls:text.tls:line: "I will have heaven and earth for my coffin and coffin shell,

sense.def: coffin; inner coffin

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: "I will have heaven and earth for my coffin and coffin shell,

sense.def: outer coffin

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: the sun and moon for my pair of jade discs,

sense.def: linked; connected with each other; adjoint (> subsequent)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: the sun and moon for my pair of jade discs,

sense.def: circular piece of jade, (which could also be of stone), with a hole in the middle, the diameter of the hole being as large as the breadth of the ring around it. One of the liù yù 六玉 used in sacrifices to Heaven and Earth and the Four Directions, as well as in various formal court ceremonials.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations for my pearls and beads,

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations for my pearls and beads,

sense.def: star

tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations for my pearls and beads,

sense.def: star

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations for my pearls and beads,

sense.def: pearl, bead

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations for my pearls and beads,

sense.def: pearls of all kinds

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: the stars and constellations for my pearls and beads,

sense.def: pearl of non-round shape

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: The furnishings for my funeral are already prepared -

sense.def: preparation

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.1 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: The furnishings for my funeral are already prepared -

sense.def: be completely provided

tls:text.tls:srcline:
弟子曰：
「吾恐烏鳶之食夫子也。」

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 32.12.2 Guo Qingfan 1063; Wang Shumin 1289; Fang Yong 870; Chen Guying 850

tls:text.tls:line: "But we're afraid the crows and kites will eat you, Master!" said his disciples.

sense.def: an (identifiabe) disciple, the disciple

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.3 Guo Qingfan 1066; Wang Shumin 1293; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: he who does not depart from the Pure

sense.def: exquisite parts; exquisite essence

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.3 Guo Qingfan 1066; Wang Shumin 1293; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: he who does not depart from the True

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.4 Guo Qingfan 1066; Wang Shumin 1293; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: one who does this is called a gentleman.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.5 Guo Qingfan 1066; Wang Shumin 1293; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: give first thought to food and clothing, keep in mind the need to produce and grow,

sense.def: the most important point; the essential thing, the main thing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.6 Guo Qingfan 1067; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: companions of holiness and enlightenment,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.6 Guo Qingfan 1067; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: their bounty extended to the hundred clans.

sense.def: the people (as grammatical object)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.6 Guo Qingfan 1067; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: in what was great or small, coarse or fine,

sense.def: ZZ 17.593: be crude and visible (parts of the material world)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舊法世傳之史尚多有之。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.7 Guo Qingfan 1067; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: is in many cases still reflected in the old laws and records of the historiographers handed down over the ages.

sense.def: There are many instances of N1

tls:text.tls:srcline: 百家之學時或稱而道之。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.8 Guo Qingfan 1067; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: the scholars of the hundred schools from time to time taking up one or the other in their praises and preachings.

sense.def: teaching, doctrine

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.9 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: examines it, and pronounces it good.

sense.def: investigate

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.9 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: But it is like the case of the ear, the eye, the nose, and the mouth:

sense.def: nose

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.9 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: In the same way, the various skills of the hundred schools

sense.def: (one who is skillful >) XUN: skilled worker

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.10 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: tries to judge the beauty of Heaven and earth,

sense.def: pass judgment on

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.10 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: tries to judge the beauty of Heaven and earth,

sense.def: physical beauty; handsomeness; splendour; good looks

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.10 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: to pry into the principles of the ten thousand things,

sense.def: pattern of things, natural principle; Principle; reasonable principle, reason

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.10 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: to scrutinize the perfection of the ancients,

sense.def: perfection, completeness, wholeness; perfect success

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.10 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: to describe the true face of holy brightness.

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.10 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: to describe the true face of holy brightness.

sense.def: characteristic appearance; physiognomy (also of things generally) bodily comportment, physical expression; especially as expressive of inner mood or personality

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.1.11 Guo Qingfan 1069; Wang Shumin 1297; Fang Yong 877; Chen Guying 855

tls:text.tls:line: has fallen into darkness and is no longer clearly perceived,

sense.def: be hidden

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.1 Guo Qingfan 1072; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 862

tls:text.tls:line: there were those in ancient times who believed that the "art of the Way" lay in these things.

sense.def: this (particular abstract thing)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.2 Guo Qingfan 1072; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 862

tls:text.tls:line: With a boundless love

sense.def: all objects

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.4 Guo Qingfan 1074; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: The inner and outer coffins of the Son of Heaven were to consist of seven layers;

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.4 Guo Qingfan 1074; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: this is his rule, his ideal.

sense.def: the legal system; the laws of the land; legal provisions (of all kinds)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.5 Guo Qingfan 1074; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: and if he adopts such practices for his own burial,

sense.def: contrastive: oneself, by oneself[PERVASIVELY DIFFICULT TO DISTINGUISH FROM THE "PERSONALLY npro.adV"] Latin: semet ipse (not semet ipsum!)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.5 Guo Qingfan 1074; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: then he surely has no love for himself!

sense.def: love (oneself) 愛己

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.6 Guo Qingfan 1075; Wang Shumin 1304; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: and the world cannot endure them.

sense.def: be able to sustain (hardship and trouble); endure bear with, put up with

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: "In ancient times, when Yu dammed the flood waters

sense.def: block up; dam

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: and opened up the courses of the Yangtze and the Yellow River

sense.def: divert (a river); make canals (for water control)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: and the nine provinces,

sense.def: the nine regions of the world 揚州，梁州，青州，冀州，雍州，豫州，徐州，兗州，荊州

tls:text.tls:srcline: 禹親自操橐耜而九雜天下之川；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: at that time Yu in person carried the basket and wielded the spade,

sense.def: in person

tls:text.tls:srcline: 禹親自操橐耜而九雜天下之川；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: at that time Yu in person carried the basket and wielded the spade,

sense.def: hold in one's hands and be in charge of; hold and carry along (objects with or without a handle)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 禹親自操橐耜而九雜天下之川；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: at that time Yu in person carried the basket and wielded the spade,

sense.def: ploughshare; ploughshare-type spade; plough

tls:text.tls:srcline: 禹親自操橐耜而九雜天下之川；

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: at that time Yu in person carried the basket and wielded the spade,

sense.def: SHI: bag, often made of leather, but sometimes also made of cloth; One type of tuó 橐 is constructed as a combination of two sacks with their openings close together, worn over one's shoulder. See illustration.

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: no hair on his shins;

sense.def: shin

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.7 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: no hair on his shins;

sense.def: hair on the head of humanshair (on animals)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.9 Guo Qingfan 1077; Wang Shumin 1310; Fang Yong 8i2; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: wear wooden clogs or hempen sandals,

sense.def: straw sandal; humble typically plaited footwear, suitable for long walks, fairly high standard

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.10 Guo Qingfan 1079; Wang Shumin 1311; Fang Yong 8i3; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: The disciples of Hsiang-li Ch'in,

sense.def: the disciples

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.10 Guo Qingfan 1079; Wang Shumin 1311; Fang Yong 8i3; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: calling each other "Mo-ist factionalists."

sense.def: alternative, different 別名

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.10 Guo Qingfan 1079; Wang Shumin 1311; Fang Yong 8i3; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: In their discussions of "hard" and "white," "difference" and "sameness," they attack back and forth;

sense.def: the hard and the white> different but compatible features of things

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.10 Guo Qingfan 1079; Wang Shumin 1311; Fang Yong 8i3; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: In their discussions of "hard" and "white," "difference" and "sameness," they attack back and forth;

sense.def: identity and difference

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.12 Guo Qingfan 1080; Wang Shumin 1311; Fang Yong 8i3; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: He failed to achieve all he aimed for,

sense.def: (is) truly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.2.12 Guo Qingfan 1080; Wang Shumin 1311; Fang Yong 8i3; Chen Guying 863

tls:text.tls:line: He was indeed a gentleman of ability!

sense.def: wither away; become emaciated

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.1 Guo Qingfan 10i2; Wang Shumin 1319; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 870

tls:text.tls:line: to seek peace and security for the world,

sense.def: peacefulness; peace

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.1 Guo Qingfan 10i2; Wang Shumin 1319; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 870

tls:text.tls:line: full provender for others as well as oneself,

sense.def: my

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.2 Guo Qingfan 10i2; Wang Shumin 1319; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 870

tls:text.tls:line: Their chief task lay, they felt, in the effort to establish these ideals.

sense.def: the most important point; the essential thing, the main thing

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.2 Guo Qingfan 10i2; Wang Shumin 1319; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 870

tls:text.tls:line: to outlaw aggression, to abolish the use of arms,

sense.def: stop (arms/warfare)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.4 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: Though their own disciples went hungry, however,

sense.def: the disciples

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.5 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: How lofty their aims, these saviors of the world!

sense.def: plan; planning activity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.5 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: How lofty their aims, these saviors of the world!

sense.def: make a show of arrogance; be arrogant to others in attitude and action

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.5 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: How lofty their aims, these saviors of the world!

sense.def: come to (someone's) aid, come to the rescue of, support someone in adversity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.5 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: "The gentleman does not examine others with too harsh an eye;

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.5 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: he does not need material things in which to dress himself."

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.3.6 Guo Qingfan 10i4; Wang Shumin 1320; Fang Yong 889; Chen Guying 871

tls:text.tls:line: To outlaw aggression and abolish the use of arms -

sense.def: stop (arms/warfare)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
公而不黨，
易而无私，
決然无主，
趣物而不兩，
不顧於慮，
不謀於知，
於物无擇，
與之俱往，

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.1 Guo Qingfan 1086; Wang Shumin 1328; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 875

tls:text.tls:line: Public-spirited and not partisan, even-minded and not given to favoritism, vacant-eyed, with none for a master, trailing after things without a second thought, giving not a glance to schemes, not a moment of speculation to knowledge, choosing neither this thing nor that, but going along with all of them

sense.def: together

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.1 Guo Qingfan 1086; Wang Shumin 1328; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 875

tls:text.tls:line: - there were those in ancient times who believed that the "art of the Way" lay in such things.

sense.def: this (particular abstract thing)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.2 Guo Qingfan 1086; Wang Shumin 1328; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 875

tls:text.tls:line: "Earth is capable of bearing up but not of sheltering.

sense.def: support; bear, bear up under

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.2 Guo Qingfan 1086; Wang Shumin 1328; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 875

tls:text.tls:line: "Earth is capable of bearing up but not of sheltering.

sense.def: cover in order to protect what is covered, or sometimes to hide discreetly

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.3 Guo Qingfan 1088; Wang Shumin 1330; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 876

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason Shen Tao discarded knowledge, did away with self,

sense.def: the Self, in particular as extrovert and socially interactive (as opposed to the EGO 我 which is not essentially interactive)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.3 Guo Qingfan 1088; Wang Shumin 1330; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 876

tls:text.tls:line: but laughed at the world for honoring worthy men.

sense.def: laugh at the (nominalised) situation S

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.4 Guo Qingfan 1088; Wang Shumin 1330; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 876

tls:text.tls:line: no comprehension of what comes before or after,

sense.def: be earlier

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.6 Guo Qingfan 1088; Wang Shumin 1330; Fang Yong 893; Chen Guying 876

tls:text.tls:line: The great and eminent men would get together and laugh at him, saying,

sense.def: normally: find ridiculous and laugh at, sneer at

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.4.8 Guo Qingfan 1091; Wang Shumin 1330; Fang Yong 894; Chen Guying 876

tls:text.tls:line: and, when they said a thing was right, they could not avoid raising the possibility that it might be wrong.18'

sense.def: be correct; be right; be proper

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.1 Guo Qingfan 1093; Wang Shumin 1337; Fang Yong 898; Chen Guying 880

tls:text.tls:line: dwelling alone, peaceful and placid, in spiritual brightness

sense.def: be unperturbed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.1 Guo Qingfan 1093; Wang Shumin 1337; Fang Yong 898; Chen Guying 880

tls:text.tls:line: dwelling alone, peaceful and placid, in spiritual brightness

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.1 Guo Qingfan 1093; Wang Shumin 1337; Fang Yong 898; Chen Guying 880

tls:text.tls:line: there were those in ancient times who believed that the "art of the Way" lay in these things.

sense.def: this (particular abstract thing)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.2 Guo Qingfan 1094; Wang Shumin 1337; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: then things will of themselves reveal their forms to him.

sense.def: display (oneself)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.3 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: "Know the male

sense.def: maleness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.3 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: but cling to the female;

sense.def: feminity; female role

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.3 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: "Take to yourself the filth of the world."

sense.def: dirt, dust

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.4 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: In his movement he was easygoing and did not wear himself out.

sense.def: conduct (one's person); act out (the role of a gentleman etc);

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.4 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: In his movement he was easygoing and did not wear himself out.

sense.def: conducting oneself

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.4 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: In his movement he was easygoing and did not wear himself out.

sense.def: what is expected of one as a person, one's role？？？？？？行身 "act out one's role"???

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.4 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: In his movement he was easygoing and did not wear himself out.

sense.def: be slow and comfortable; be mild

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.4 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: Dwelling in inaction, he scoffed at skill.

sense.def: normally: find ridiculous and laugh at, sneer at

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.5 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: Others all seek good fortune;

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.5 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: "Let us somehow or other avoid incurring blame!"

sense.def: (deserved) bad fortune; (deserved) disaster; (deserved) calamity

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.5 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: what is sharp will be blunted."

sense.def: be pointed and sharp; be well-focussed

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.5 Guo Qingfan 1095; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: what is sharp will be blunted."

sense.def: be blunted

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.5.6 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1338; Fang Yong 899; Chen Guying 8i1

tls:text.tls:line: with their breadth and stature, they indeed were the True Men of old!

sense.def: the true man; the man who is true to himself; the man who has realised himself; a person who has truly realised his potential

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.1 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: transforming, changing, never constant:

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.1 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: do we move in the company of spiritual brightness?

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.2 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: He expounded them in odd and outlandish terms, i

sense.def: absurd

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.2 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: n brash and bombastic language,

sense.def: exaggerated, extravagant

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.3 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: He came and went alone with the pure spirit of Heaven and earth,

sense.def: subtle spirit; subtle spirits [occasionally: essential sprits; vital forces][CA]; soul as seat of thought

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.3 Guo Qingfan 1098; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: He did not scold over "right" and "wrong,"

sense.def: reprimand (inferior), formally accuse of misdeeds; make accusations about (a person)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.4 Guo Qingfan 1099; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: Above he wandered with the Creator,

sense.def: make up; fashion, create; invent QIMINYAOSHU 蔡倫立意造紙

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.4 Guo Qingfan 1099; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: As for the Source,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.4 Guo Qingfan 1099; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: As for the Ancestor,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.5 Guo Qingfan 1099; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: Nevertheless, in responding to change

sense.def: substantial and typically irreversible transformation into something new; natural transformation

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.6.5 Guo Qingfan 1099; Wang Shumin 1343; Fang Yong 903; Chen Guying 8i4

tls:text.tls:line: an approach that can never be shuffled off.

sense.def: be transformed, undergo metamorphosis

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.7.1 Guo Qingfan 1102; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 887

tls:text.tls:line: But his doctrines were jumbled and perverse

sense.def: be contrary

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.7.1 Guo Qingfan 1102; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 887

tls:text.tls:line: But his doctrines were jumbled and perverse

sense.def: be contradictory

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.7.2 Guo Qingfan 1102; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 887

tls:text.tls:line: mountains and marshes are on the same level.

sense.def: be level; be flat; be not too steep

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.7.3 Guo Qingfan 1102; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 887

tls:text.tls:line: Let love embrace the ten thousand things;

sense.def: all objects

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.1 Guo Qingfan 1105; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 895

tls:text.tls:line: An egg has feathers.

sense.def: feather

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.1 Guo Qingfan 1105; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 895

tls:text.tls:line: Horses lay eggs.

sense.def: egg

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.1 Guo Qingfan 1105; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 895

tls:text.tls:line: Toads have tails.

sense.def: tail (of beasts or birds)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.2 Guo Qingfan 1106; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 895

tls:text.tls:line: Fire is not hot.26

sense.def: fire

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.2 Guo Qingfan 1106; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 906; Chen Guying 895

tls:text.tls:line: Fire is not hot.26

sense.def: be burning hot; be sizzling hot; be extremely warm (of clothes)

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.3 Guo Qingfan 1106; Wang Shumin 1350; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: No matter how swift the barbed arrow,

sense.def: arrowhead; sometimes specifically an arrowhead made of copper

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: Nevertheless, Hui Shih's manner of speaking

sense.def: oral

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: Nevertheless, Hui Shih's manner of speaking

sense.def: conversation, public dialogue

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: showed that he considered himself the ablest man alive.

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: All he knew how to do was play the hero; he had no real art.

sense.def: maleness

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: who asked why Heaven and earth do not collapse and crumble,

sense.def: fall down; sink down; stumble

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: or what makes the wind and rain, the thunder and lightning.

sense.def: wind, rain and the like

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.5 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: or what makes the wind and rain, the thunder and lightning.

sense.def: thunder

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.7 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: he walked a road that was crooked indeed!

sense.def: major one-track mud-road suitable for carts; road

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.7 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: he walked a road that was crooked indeed!

sense.def: deep; profound; subtle

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.7 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: of what use are they to other things?

sense.def: in relation to, within the field of, etc

tls:line.title: 莊子(en)
tls:line.loc: ZHUANG 33.8.8 Guo Qingfan 1111; Wang Shumin 1366; Fang Yong 907; Chen Guying 896

tls:text.tls:line: or to prove that form can outrun shadow.

sense.def: compete with with all one's strength to V, vie with others in Ving
